Yes, I took a bus to get to the airport. I got there early and I waited for my friend.
對，我是搭客運去那裡的，但是我早到了，所以我在那邊等了一下我朋友。
那為什麼後來會發生你拿原告帽子這件事呢?
So why did the thing happen (like) that you took other’s helmet?
I was waiting for my friend but his flight was delayed. I got bored and went around to kill time.
因為我朋友的班機延誤了，然後當時為了打發時間所以我就到處繞繞來殺時間。
你後來去了哪裡呢?
So where did you go later?
I went to the parking lot for motorcycles.
我去了摩托車的停車場。
然後發生了什麼事呢?
So… what happened?
I saw a cap left on one motorcycle.
我看到有一頂帽子遺落在機車座椅上。
(提示偵卷第五頁之照片)請問是照片中這頂帽子嗎?
Please see the picture five. Is that cap actually this hat?
Yes, it is that cap.
對，就是那頂帽子。
然後呢? 發生了什麼事?
So what happened later?
Because there was no one around, I took the cap.
因為當時四下無人，所以我就把帽子拿走了。
你是說你就拿了那頂帽子?
Did you say that you just took away other’s hat?
Yes, I did.
對，是我做的。
你難道不知道那頂帽子是別人的，你不可以隨便拿走嗎?
Don’t you know that cap belong(s) to other? You can’t do that.
I am sorry for what I did. I tried to return the cap to the owner. I brought it here with me today.
我很抱歉我所做過的行為，但是我有想要把帽子還給當事人，就像我今天有把帽子帶來。
所以我再跟你確認一次，你那天在機場的機車停車場，看到這頂帽子，因為那時周遭沒人，你就拿了這頂帽子，對嗎?
So let me confirm again. At that day, you took this cap at motorcycle parking lot because there is no one seeing. So you just took it, right?
Yes, that’s what happened.
對，這就是事情發生的經過。
因為現在原告已經提告，那你有意願跟對方道歉、和解嗎?
Now the victim had accused you, so do you have the will to solve this problem?
I tried to apologize to the owner of the cap, but he wouldn’t talk to me.
我有嘗試向物主道歉但是他不接受。
沒關係，如果你有意願，我們會幫你跟原告進行和解，那先訂103年2月27日早上9點鐘進行調解，你可以到庭嗎? 如果一切順利，可能就會以金錢賠償的方式，結束這個案子，你明白嗎?

Don’t mind. If you want to apologize to the victim, we will help you. So we would like to have you to have a meeting with him at nine o’clock on February 27th, 2014. If everything goes well, this case may end up with some money payment. Do you understand?
I understand and I will be here.
是的，我了解了。我一定會出席的。
好，那我們會通知原告，如果日期不能配合，我們會再通知你，可以嗎? 如果沒有問題，就請你那天準時到本棟四樓的調解室，明白嗎?
So we will let the victim know the date. And if he cannot show up, we would let you know. Is this okay? No other questions, please show up (on) that day at fourth floor. Do you understand?
Thank you. I will be there on time.
是的，謝謝。我了解了，我會準時出席的。
好，那今天的程序到此結束。
So that’s the end of today’s case.

今天我們進行Ferry Johnson與史彩雲之子女撫養權之準備程序。請問雙方都有請辯護人嗎？

Today I want to know the two sides’positions with the child rearing case and I would know why each of you think you are the better side to keep this child. Please state the details especially at this point. Besides, I know this case also has divorce ongoing. So I hope the case of verbal attack does not happen.
I understand.
我了解了
了解。
Yes, I understand.
請問告訴人你為什麼希望能夠爭取孩子的撫養權？就我所知，你目前在台灣並沒有全職的工作，又因為你本人是外國人的身分，在爭取子女撫養權一事上，你為什麼認為你比較適任呢？

I have few questions for the plaintiff. Why do you want to get the child rearing right for the kid? As I know, in Taiwan, you don’t have a full-time job and you are a foreigner. Why do you think you are more capable in the case of child rearing?

I hope to be granted with the sole custody of my daughter because of two concerns. First, my wife no longer lives with us. I want to be there to see my daughter grow up. Moreover, I have heard that my wife is living with another man. If that is the case, I doubt it very much that she can give our daughter the best care she deserves. Therefore, I hope to have the sole custody.
我希望法院能判給我全部的撫養權，我有兩個原因。第一，我的妻子沒有再與我們同住了，我想要看著我的女兒長大。再者，我聽說我的太太與其他男人同居，如果這是真，我很疑惑他是否能給我們的女兒完整的照顧，因此我希望獲得撫養權。
你的意思是說，因為你太太雖然目前還在跟你打離婚官司，可是她已經沒有跟你同住，而且你還懷疑她與其他男子同居。因為這種情況，你不願意把你們的孩子交給她照顧，是這樣子的嗎？

so do you mean because your wife is now going to divorce with you and at the same time she’living with another man and you also suspected her of living with another man. Is it because of this situation so you don’t want to leave your daughter to her, is that right?
Yes, those are my main concerns.
對，這些是我主要的顧慮。
另外，那麼對於你個人的經濟能力，也就是你如果能到子女撫養權，你打算要怎麼照顧你的女兒？
In addition, according to your financial status, if you get the sole custody, what would you do to take care of this child?

It is true that I don’t currently hold a full-time job. However, I have several part-time jobs which bring me a regular income. I believe that income will be sufficient for me to take care of myself and my daughter.
我現在的確是們有全職的工作，但是我有兼職許多工作所以我有固定的收入，我想這些收入應該足以支撐我和女兒的生活。
你剛剛提到你目前有好幾份兼職工作，因為它們本身都是兼職的性質，你能夠保守估計自己每個月會有多少的固定收入嗎？
You just mentioned now you have several part time jobs. Because these are all part time jobs, can you estimate around how much income you will get every month?
I have, on average, four to five part-time jobs. As a total, they will bring me about NT$50,000 per month. Sometimes, if I have new projects, I may be able to have more income.
我有至少4-5件兼職工作，所以平均一個月我可以賺一萬五千元，有時候如果有接到新的計畫，可能有機會賺更多。
另外我想要問的問題，是關於你有沒有可能在得到孩子撫養權後，把孩子帶回加拿大，就不回來了呢？我會這樣問，主要是因為，即使你拿到撫養權，你太太還是可能可以保有探視權，如果你把小孩子帶回你的國家，就會變成是變相的隔離她們母女見面。對這一點，你有什麼意見。

I have another question, is it possible that when you get the sole custody of your child, you are going to bring your child back to Canada. I will as this question is because even you get the sole custody, your wife still has the visitation right. If you take your daughter back to Canada, this will be seen as you cut the tie of your daughter with the mother. To this argument, what’s your plea?

I have stayed in Taiwan for five years already. I have an ARC and I like this place. So far, I don’t have any plan to leave Taiwan. Especially, I believe that my daughter should have the opportunity to see both of her parents. I want to emphasize that although my wife and I are currently seeking a divorce, I have no intention of cutting the tie between her and my daughter. During the entire period of our divorce case, I have regularly sent our daughter’s pictures to my wife. I even arranged outings to encourage her to spend time with us, me and our daughter.
我已經在台灣待了五年了，我有居留證而且我也喜歡這裡，目前我對在台灣的生活很滿意，特別是我希望我的女兒可以看到他的父母。我要說的是目前我和我太太正在打離婚官司，我們並不希望彼此切斷與女兒的聯繫。在我們離婚官司進行中，我定期會繼我們女兒的照面給太太看，我甚至還安排時間讓我們三個有時兼聚一聚。
所以你的意思是指，在近期之內你並沒有返回母國的打算，是這樣嗎？
so do you mean that in the recent future, you have no plan to go back to Canada, is that right?
No, I may go back to Canada because my mother is old and sick. However, even if I go back, I wouldn’t stay long. I won’t even consider the possibility of taking my daughter with me.
不，我有可能會回加拿大因為我的母親年紀大了又生病，但即使我回去也不會長久待在那，我甚至不會考慮把女兒帶在身邊。
那接下來我要請問相對人，請問你現在已經沒有跟先生同住了嗎？
Now I’m going to ask free questions to the defendant. Currently you are not living your husband any more?
對，我們已經分居六個月了。
Yes, you have been separated for six months.
請問妳是什麼時候提出離婚訴訟的。
When did you file the case of divorcing?
我大概是兩個月前提的。
I guess I filed it two months ago.
也就是說，早在你提出離婚訴訟之前，你們就已經沒有住在一起了。
So you mean far before you filed the case, you hadn’t lived together already.
是的。
Yes.
那請問妳現在的居住狀況如何？我指的是，跟誰住？
What is your living circumstances right now? I mean, who do you live with?
我帶著第一任婚姻的兒子一起住。
I live with my son in the first marriage.
第一任婚姻？那你跟告訴人的婚姻是第幾次？
Oh, you mean your first marriage? So what is your marriage with Ferry Johnson right now?
他是我第二任先生。
He’s my second husband.
所以現在爭的子女撫養權，是你跟第二任先生的小孩？是個女兒？
In the child rearing right that you are fighting for right now is with your second husband and it’s a daughter?
對。
Yes
你的兒子幾歲了？女兒幾歲了？
How old is your son and how old is your daughter?
我兒子7歲了，我女兒8個月大。
My son is seven years old and my daughter is eight months old.
那你搬出去住的時候，女兒是跟你、還是跟他？
When you moved out, was your daughter with you or him?
因為我搬出去的時候，女兒只有2個月大，還很需要我的照顧，所以孩子跟我。
When I moved out my daughter was only two months old so she stayed with me.
那現在孩子在誰那裏？
where is the child right now?
現在女兒在我先生那裏。
my daughter is at my husband’s place.
你們中間有什麼協議嗎，為什麼原來女兒跟你，現在跟他。
do you have any agreement between you two? Why did the daughter stay with you in the first place and then move to your husband’s place?
我搬出來住的地方比較小，原來跟先生的房子比較大。環境上來說，對孩子比較優，所以我把孩子交給先生。
The place I just moved out is smaller and my husband’s bigger. In terms of the environment, my husband’s place is better so I leave the daughter to him.
那如果客觀條件沒有改變的話，你的居住環境，對你女兒仍然比較不好，不是嗎？那為什麼會希望能夠爭取子女撫養權呢
If the objective circumstances don’t change, I mean your living situations, your daughter still better stays at your husband’s place? Why do you want to win the child rearing right?
她是我懷胎十個月生下來的阿，我怎麼捨得以後都看不到她呢？而且我先生是加拿大籍，他在台灣的工作也沒有很穩定，隨時有可能會回去加拿大，那這樣子的話，我不就見不到女兒了嗎？所以我希望能夠爭取女兒的撫養權。

It took me ten months to get the child. I couldn’t stand that I cannot see her any more. And my husband is a Canadian and he doesn’t have a full-time job. He may go back to Canada any time. Thus, it means I cannot see my daughter any more. That’s why I’m asking the custody of my daughter.
就妳的經濟能力而言，你可以加以說明如何負擔女兒的撫養費用嗎？
In terms of your financial status, can you elaborate how would you raise your daughter?
我們目前還在打離婚官司，我希望能夠爭取到離婚之後能住在我先生現居的那棟房子裡，所以就環境來講，那棟房子會很適合我女兒成長。至於我個人的經濟能力，我有提供給法院一份目前我的財產表，除此之外，我也有固定的工作，一個月收入至少是4萬以上。我想我有能力撫養、照顧我的女兒。

We still have the divorcing case going. I hope after the case of divorce I can live where my husband’s living now, the house. Thus in terms of environment, the house is better for my daughter. As to my financial status, I’ve offered the court a list of my asset. Besides, I have a regular job. I earn at least 40000 a month. I think I have the right to rear my daughter.
請問你們目前的離婚案件進行地如何？有預定什麼時候判決會出來嗎？或是說，大概什麼時候判決會出來？
So what’s the process going of your divorcing case? Do you know around what time the case will be settled?
我不太確定，我們這個禮拜五還會再出庭一次，可是我希望能夠向離婚案件的法官表達，希望判決能夠盡快出來。
I’m not quite sure. This Friday we will go to the court again. I will talk to the judge of the case that we hope to see the result faster.
這樣好了，本院會安排社工人員造訪告訴人跟相對人雙方，並且針對你們與孩子的相處情況做出評估，本庭會參考他們的報告，來決定怎麼樣的安排對孩子是最好的。不過在那之前，想先請問一下，你們雙方會考慮共同持有撫養權嗎？所謂的共同撫養，是指孩子一段時間跟父親、另外一段時間跟母親。

Let’s say we will arrange social workers to visit both the plaintiff’s and the defendant’s houses and we will take into account the interactions of both sides with the child. The court will consider the report after the visit and make the best decision for the daughter. However, before that, will both sides consider the shared custody? The sahred custody means that the daughter will stay sometimes at the mother’s place and sometimes at father’s place.

Personally, I do not favor this arrangement because my daughter is still too small. She is only 8 months old. I don’t want her to go through the changes between me and my wife. For a child at such a young age, it is too confusing for her if she has to stay with one parent for some time and another for another period of time.
對我個人而言我是不希望共同撫養權，因為我的女兒還太小，他才八個月大，我不希望她在我與太太之間流轉。對於這樣年紀小的孩子來說，我覺得這樣太累，一下子搬到母親的地方、一下子換到我的地方。
在這點上面，我同意我先生的看法。女兒還太小，不應該、也不適合共同撫養的安排方式。
At this point, I agree with my husband. The daughter is too little. She shouldn’t and it’s not suitable in this case.
既然如此，那麼我們就先進行社工探視的安排。等到他們做出報告，我們再安排庭期，讓雙方有陳述意見的機會。這樣可以嗎？
So we all arrange the visit of social workers first. After we see the report, we will arrange the next court day to keep the right for both parties to state their rights.
Yes, I am fine with social workers’ visits.
我同意社工人員的探訪。
沒有問題，謝謝。
I don’t have any question here. Thank you.

The place I live now is smaller, and the original house I lived with my husband is bigger. Considering about the environment, I think the old house is better for my daughter, so I took her back to live with my husband.
那如果客觀條件沒有改變的話，你的居住環境，對你女兒仍然比較不好，不是嗎？那為什麼會希望能夠爭取子女撫養權呢
So considering about the objective circumstance, I mean the space of your house, it’s still worse for her, isn’t it? Then why would you want the custody of your daughter?
她是我懷胎十個月生下來的阿，我怎麼捨得以後都看不到她呢？而且我先生是加拿大籍，他在台灣的工作也沒有很穩定，隨時有可能會回去加拿大，那這樣子的話，我不就見不到女兒了嗎？所以我希望能夠爭取女兒的撫養權。

Come on, I borne her! How would you think I don’t want to see her in the future? Also my husband is a Canadian, and his job is Taiwan is not stable so he may go back to Canada anytime. In that case, doesn’t that mean I can see my daughter anymore? So I want to have the custody of my daughter.
就妳的經濟能力而言，你可以加以說明如何負擔女兒的撫養費用嗎？
Can you tell me how would bring up your child? With your financial status.
我們目前還在打離婚官司，我希望能夠爭取到離婚之後能住在我先生現居的那棟房子裡，所以就環境來講，那棟房子會很適合我女兒成長。至於我個人的經濟能力，我有提供給法院一份目前我的財產表，除此之外，我也有固定的工作，一個月收入至少是4萬以上。我想我有能力撫養、照顧我的女兒。

So far, we are still dealing with the divorcing case. I want to fight for the right to live in the house which my husband lives now, after our divorce. So consider about the environmental issue, the house will suit my daughter a lot. As for my financial status, I have given the court an asset list. Also, I have a regular income; it’s about 40000 per month. So I think I have the ability to take care of my daughter.
請問你們目前的離婚案件進行地如何？有預定什麼時候判決會出來嗎？或是說，大概什麼時候判決會出來？
So how your divorcing case is goes now? Do you know when will the court’s decision come out?
我不太確定，我們這個禮拜五還會再出庭一次，可是我希望能夠向離婚案件的法官表達，希望判決能夠盡快出來。
I am not very sure about that. We will go to the court this Friday. I will ask the judge of our divorcing case to make the decision as soon.
這樣好了，本院會安排社工人員造訪告訴人跟相對人雙方，並且針對你們與孩子的相處情況做出評估，本庭會參考他們的報告，來決定怎麼樣的安排對孩子是最好的。不過在那之前，想先請問一下，你們雙方會考慮共同持有撫養權嗎？所謂的共同撫養，是指孩子一段時間跟父親、另外一段時間跟母親。

Okay, then I will sent the social to do to visit both of your houses. And make an evaluation of how you get along with your daughter. And I will take their report into consideration to decide what’s best for the child. Before that, I want to ask both of you, would you consider about sharing shared custody of your daughter? The shared custody goes like that, your daughter will live with you sometime, and the other time lives with your husband.

Personally, I do not favor this arrangement because my daughter is still too small. She is only 8 months old. I don’t want her to go through the changes between me and my wife. For a child at such a young age, it is too confusing for her if she has to stay with one parent for some time and another for another period of time.
我個人不支持這個 因為我女兒還在小了 他只有八個月大耶 我不想要她一直在我跟我老婆之間一直改變環境 對一個這麼小的小孩來說 他會混淆吧 如果他真得要這樣跟我住一段時間又跟她住一段時間
在這點上面，我同意我先生的看法。女兒還太小，不應該、也不適合共同撫養的安排方式。
I agree with my husband in this. She is too small, it shouldn’t to this way.
既然如此，那麼我們就先進行社工探視的安排。等到他們做出報告，我們再安排庭期，讓雙方有陳述意見的機會。這樣可以嗎？
Okay, then, I will arrange the social worker to your houses first. After the make the report, we will set the court date to let both of you have a chance to make a statement, is that okay with you?
Yes, I am fine with social workers’ visits.
好啊 社工要來我可以
沒有問題，謝謝。
I am fine with that, too.

我搬出來住的地方比較小，原來跟先生的房子比較大。環境上來說，對孩子比較優，所以我把孩子交給先生。

The place I live after I moved out is smaller than the place my husband have. After consideration of the environment, I think the bigger house is more suitable for my daughter so I let my husband to take care of my daughter.
那如果客觀條件沒有改變的話，你的居住環境，對你女兒仍然比較不好，不是嗎？那為什麼會希望能夠爭取子女撫養權呢
If the objective circumstance does not change, I mean that you sill live in the smaller house, I don’t think it will be good for your child. Why do you want to fight for the rearing right?
她是我懷胎十個月生下來的阿，我怎麼捨得以後都看不到她呢？而且我先生是加拿大籍，他在台灣的工作也沒有很穩定，隨時有可能會回去加拿大，那這樣子的話，我不就見不到女兒了嗎？所以我希望能夠爭取女兒的撫養權。

She is “my” daughter, I can’t imagine if I cannot see her anymore. Besides, my husband is a foreigner from Canada. He might go back to Canada because he even does not have a full-time job in Taiwan. In that case, I might not see my daughter ever again. As a result, I want to fight for the rearing right of my daughter.
就妳的經濟能力而言，你可以加以說明如何負擔女兒的撫養費用嗎？
From your financial status, can you explain how do you plan to cover the money to take care of your daughter?
我們目前還在打離婚官司，我希望能夠爭取到離婚之後能住在我先生現居的那棟房子裡，所以就環境來講，那棟房子會很適合我女兒成長。至於我個人的經濟能力，我有提供給法院一份目前我的財產表，除此之外，我也有固定的工作，一個月收入至少是4萬以上。我想我有能力撫養、照顧我的女兒。

Now, we are still on the divorce case. Now, I hope to get the court decision that my daughter and I can live in the house which my husband currently live. According to the environment, I think that house will be very suitable for the growth of my daughter. About my personal financial status, I have already given the court my asset lists. Moreover, I have the full-time job and the salary is about forty thousand NT dollars a month. I think I am able to take care of my daughter.
請問你們目前的離婚案件進行地如何？有預定什麼時候判決會出來嗎？或是說，大概什麼時候判決會出來？
Can you tell me what stage are your divorce case in? Do you know when or around what time the court decision will be given?
我不太確定，我們這個禮拜五還會再出庭一次，可是我希望能夠向離婚案件的法官表達，希望判決能夠盡快出來。
I am not sure. We will be here for the divorce case this Friday. I hope I may ask the judge of my divorce case to give the court decision as soon as possible.
這樣好了，本院會安排社工人員造訪告訴人跟相對人雙方，並且針對你們與孩子的相處情況做出評估，本庭會參考他們的報告，來決定怎麼樣的安排對孩子是最好的。不過在那之前，想先請問一下，你們雙方會考慮共同持有撫養權嗎？所謂的共同撫養，是指孩子一段時間跟父親、另外一段時間跟母親。

The court will hire the social workers to visit the houses of both parties. Also, according to the ways you dealing with your children, the social worker will evaluate it. The report will be examined by the court and we will make a decision on it. But before that, I want to ask both parties if you ever consider the shared custody? Shared custody is defined as follows, the child will firstly with the father and then he or she will latter with mother.

Personally, I do not favor this arrangement because my daughter is still too small. She is only 8 months old. I don’t want her to go through the changes between me and my wife. For a child at such a young age, it is too confusing for her if she has to stay with one parent for some time and another for another period of time.
就個人來講，我不太喜歡這種方式因為我女兒還很小，她才八個月大欸，我不想讓她經歷我和太太之間的變動，對這麼小的孩子來說，這會讓她很混亂，為什麼有時候和爸爸在一起，有時才能見媽媽呢?
在這點上面，我同意我先生的看法。女兒還太小，不應該、也不適合共同撫養的安排方式。
To this point, I agree with my husband. My daughter is too young, she should not and not suitable to go through the changes.
既然如此，那麼我們就先進行社工探視的安排。等到他們做出報告，我們再安排庭期，讓雙方有陳述意見的機會。這樣可以嗎？

I see, we will arrange the social worker to visit both parties. After they write down their report, we will arrange the next court time. Then we will let both parties to state their thoughts, is it clear?
Yes, I am fine with social workers’ visits.
好，社工人員來探訪沒有問題。
沒有問題，謝謝。
I agree with it, thank you.

今天我們進行Ferry Johnson與史彩雲之子女撫養權之準備程序。請問雙方都有請辯護人嗎？
Today’s preparation procedure is for Ferry Johnson and Ms. Shi for child rearing procedure.Do both parties have lawyers?
我有委託律師。
Yes, I have a lawyer.
I also have a lawyer.
我也有，我也是。
今天的準備程序中，我主要希望了解雙方在子女撫養權上的立場，也希望能夠知道為什麼你們各自認為自己比較適任撫養這個孩子。請就這一點特別的加以闡述，好嗎？此外，我知道你們這一件，也正在打離婚案件，所以希望雙方盡量不要發生在言語上攻擊對方的情況。了解嗎？

Today I am here; my real purpose is to understand what’s your status in this child rearing. Also, I want to know why both of you think you have the right to rear this child. Please focus on this point clearly. Besides, I know you are under the procedure of the case of divorce. I hope you can avoid the verbal attacking, do you understand?
I understand.
我瞭解。
了解。
Yes, I do.
請問告訴人你為什麼希望能夠爭取孩子的撫養權？就我所知，你目前在台灣並沒有全職的工作，又因為你本人是外國人的身分，在爭取子女撫養權一事上，你為什麼認為你比較適任呢？

So now, I will ask some question for plaintiff. Why you want to fight for the right for rearing your child? As I know, you don’t have the fall-time job in Taiwan now. You are a foreigner. Why do you think you are more proper than the defense that you can rear your child?

I hope to be granted with the sole custody of my daughter because of two concerns. First, my wife no longer lives with us. I want to be there to see my daughter grow up. Moreover, I have heard that my wife is living with another man. If that is the case, I doubt it very much that she can give our daughter the best care she deserves. Therefore, I hope to have the sole custody.
我希望能把我的孩子判給我是因為有一些考慮的。第一點，我的老婆沒有跟我們住在一起，我想在那看著我女兒長大。此外我聽說我老婆跟別人住。如果那是真的的話，我非常懷疑她是否有能力給們的女兒最好的照顧。因此我希望能得到全部的撫養權。
你的意思是說，因為你太太雖然目前還在跟你打離婚官司，可是她已經沒有跟你同住，而且你還懷疑她與其他男子同居。因為這種情況，你不願意把你們的孩子交給她照顧，是這樣子的嗎？

You mean that your wife is under the procedure of a divorce case and she doesn’t live with you. Is that right? Also, you suspected that she is living with other man. Are those concerns that you think you don’t want your daughter to live with your wife?
Yes, those are my main concerns.
沒錯，那些是我主要的顧慮。
另外，那麼對於你個人的經濟能力，也就是你如果能到子女撫養權，你打算要怎麼照顧你的女兒？
As to your financial status, if you got the custody of your daughter, how can you raise her up?

It is true that I don’t currently hold a full-time job. However, I have several part-time jobs which bring me a regular income. I believe that income will be sufficient for me to take care of myself and my daughter.
我現在沒有全職工作是真的。但是我有幾分臨時工可以讓我有固定的收入，我認為我的收入足夠讓我和我的女兒生活。
你剛剛提到你目前有好幾份兼職工作，因為它們本身都是兼職的性質，你能夠保守估計自己每個月會有多少的固定收入嗎？
You just mentioned that you have several part-time jobs. Because those jobs are part-time jobs, can you calculate how much can you earn each month?
I have, on average, four to five part-time jobs. As a total, they will bring me about NT$50,000 per month. Sometimes, if I have new projects, I may be able to have more income.
我平均大約有四到五個兼職。大約可以讓我賺到一萬五千元台幣每個月。有時候如果我有新的工作的話我會有新的收入。
另外我想要問的問題，是關於你有沒有可能在得到孩子撫養權後，把孩子帶回加拿大，就不回來了呢？我會這樣問，主要是因為，即使你拿到撫養權，你太太還是可能可以保有探視權，如果你把小孩子帶回你的國家，就會變成是變相的隔離她們母女見面。對這一點，你有什麼意見。

I have another question. If you have the custody of your daughter, will you bring her to Canada and never come back? The reason why I ask you that question is because although you have the custody of your daughter, your wife still has the visitation right. If you bring your daughter to your country that means you will violate the right of your wife to visit your daughter. What’s your point about this case?

I have stayed in Taiwan for five years already. I have an ARC and I like this place. So far, I don’t have any plan to leave Taiwan. Especially, I believe that my daughter should have the opportunity to see both of her parents. I want to emphasize that although my wife and I are currently seeking a divorce, I have no intention of cutting the tie between her and my daughter. During the entire period of our divorce case, I have regularly sent our daughter’s pictures to my wife. I even arranged outings to encourage her to spend time with us, me and our daughter.
我在台灣已經待了有五年了，我有居留證而且我喜歡這個地方。到目前為止我並沒有任何計畫打算離開台灣。而且我確信我的女兒有權力見到她的父母。在這裡我要強調的是:雖然我和我的老婆正在打離婚官司，但是我絕對不會切斷她們的關係。在我們打離婚官司的程序中，我時常會寄我們女兒的照片給我老婆看。我也時常安排出去，我們三個一起出遊。
所以你的意思是指，在近期之內你並沒有返回母國的打算，是這樣嗎？
You mean that recently you will not return to your mother country, is that right?
No, I may go back to Canada because my mother is old and sick. However, even if I go back, I wouldn’t stay long. I won’t even consider the possibility of taking my daughter with me.
不，有可能因為我的媽媽已經年老了也生病了。即使我回去但我也不會待太久，我甚至不會考慮把我女兒一起帶去。
那接下來我要請問相對人，請問你現在已經沒有跟先生同住了嗎？
so now, I will ask some question for other party. You don’t live with your husband, right?
對，我們已經分居六個月了。
Yes, we have separated for six months.
請問妳是什麼時候提出離婚訴訟的。
When did you have the divorce case?
我大概是兩個月前提的。
About two months ago.
也就是說，早在你提出離婚訴訟之前，你們就已經沒有住在一起了。
Before you have the case, you didn’t live together.
是的。
Yes.
那請問妳現在的居住狀況如何？我指的是，跟誰住？
Who do you live with?
我帶著第一任婚姻的兒子一起住。
I bring my son of my first marriage together.
第一任婚姻？那你跟告訴人的婚姻是第幾次？
Your first marriage? What is your marriage time with the plaintiff?
他是我第二任先生。
He is my second husband.
所以現在爭的子女撫養權，是你跟第二任先生的小孩？是個女兒？
So now, we are talking about the custody of the daughter which is you and your second husband have.
對。
Yes.
你的兒子幾歲了？女兒幾歲了？
How old is your son and your daughter?
我兒子7歲了，我女兒8個月大。
My son is eight-year old and my daughter is eight months.
那你搬出去住的時候，女兒是跟你、還是跟他？
After you leave your home, who live with your daughter?
因為我搬出去的時候，女兒只有2個月大，還很需要我的照顧，所以孩子跟我。
Because when I leave my home, my daughter was only two months so I worked her out in order to take care of her.
那現在孩子在誰那裏？
Where is your daughter now?
現在女兒在我先生那裏。
My daughter is in my husband’s house.
你們中間有什麼協議嗎，為什麼原來女兒跟你，現在跟他。
Do you have any agreement that your daughter live with you first and later she lives with your husband?
我搬出來住的地方比較小，原來跟先生的房子比較大。環境上來說，對孩子比較優，所以我把孩子交給先生。
After I left my house, I live in a small house, but the original one is bigger. According to the environment, my husband’s house is better for my child.
那如果客觀條件沒有改變的話，你的居住環境，對你女兒仍然比較不好，不是嗎？那為什麼會希望能夠爭取子女撫養權呢
If the objective circumstance that your house is not good enough, your daughter lives with your husband is a better choice, isn’t that right? Why you want to own the custody of your daughter?
她是我懷胎十個月生下來的阿，我怎麼捨得以後都看不到她呢？而且我先生是加拿大籍，他在台灣的工作也沒有很穩定，隨時有可能會回去加拿大，那這樣子的話，我不就見不到女兒了嗎？所以我希望能夠爭取女兒的撫養權。

I spent ten months to have my daughter. How can I endure that I cannot see her in the future? Furthermore, my husband is a Canadian and he doesn’t have a full-time job. Also, he may leave Taiwan to Canada. As a result, I may not see my daughter in the future. So I hope I can fight for the custody of my daughter.
就妳的經濟能力而言，你可以加以說明如何負擔女兒的撫養費用嗎？
How can you afford the expense for your daughter in your financial status?
我們目前還在打離婚官司，我希望能夠爭取到離婚之後能住在我先生現居的那棟房子裡，所以就環境來講，那棟房子會很適合我女兒成長。至於我個人的經濟能力，我有提供給法院一份目前我的財產表，除此之外，我也有固定的工作，一個月收入至少是4萬以上。我想我有能力撫養、照顧我的女兒。

Now, we are still under the procedure of divorce case. I want to have the right to live in my husband’s house after the divorce. According to the environment, my husband’s house is suitable for my daughter to grow. As to my financial status, I have provided an asset list to the court. Besides, I have a regular full-time job. I earn about forty thousand NT dollars a month. I think I have the ability to take care of my daughter.
請問你們目前的離婚案件進行地如何？有預定什麼時候判決會出來嗎？或是說，大概什麼時候判決會出來？
How’s your divorce case? When is the result be made about time?
我不太確定，我們這個禮拜五還會再出庭一次，可是我希望能夠向離婚案件的法官表達，希望判決能夠盡快出來。
I am not sure. This Friday we will have a court again. I will inform the judge in that court to make the decision earlier.
這樣好了，本院會安排社工人員造訪告訴人跟相對人雙方，並且針對你們與孩子的相處情況做出評估，本庭會參考他們的報告，來決定怎麼樣的安排對孩子是最好的。不過在那之前，想先請問一下，你們雙方會考慮共同持有撫養權嗎？所謂的共同撫養，是指孩子一段時間跟父親、另外一段時間跟母親。

Ok, the court will have social workers to visit both of you, you and your husband. And make the evaluation to the situation that you and your husband’s accompanying your daughter. We will see the evaluation to decide the best choice for your daughter. So before the evaluation, I want to ask both of you that can you share the custody of your daughter? What is share custody is that your daughter will live with your husband for a period of time and later she will leave with you.

Personally, I do not favor this arrangement because my daughter is still too small. She is only 8 months old. I don’t want her to go through the changes between me and my wife. For a child at such a young age, it is too confusing for her if she has to stay with one parent for some time and another for another period of time.
基本上我不太贊同這個決議，因為我的女兒太小了，她才八個月大。我不想要她在我和我老婆之間換來換去。以我女兒現在的年紀來講，如果她一下子跟她媽媽住、一下子跟她爸爸住，這會讓她搞混。
在這點上面，我同意我先生的看法。女兒還太小，不應該、也不適合共同撫養的安排方式。
To that point, I agree with my husband. Our daughter is too young, so it’s not proper and should not use that method.
既然如此，那麼我們就先進行社工探視的安排。等到他們做出報告，我們再安排庭期，讓雙方有陳述意見的機會。這樣可以嗎？
Ok, now we arrange the schedule of social worker first. After they make a report, we will arrange the court day to give you the opportunity to state yourself, is that ok?
Yes, I am fine with social workers’ visits.
OK 沒問題。
沒有問題，謝謝。
I am ok, too.

Today we are here for the procedure of child rearing rights for Ms. Tsai-Hung Shin and Mr. Ferry Johnson. Do both have the lawyer?
我有委託律師。
Yes, I did
I also have a lawyer.
我也有請律師
今天的準備程序中，我主要希望了解雙方在子女撫養權上的立場，也希望能夠知道為什麼你們各自認為自己比較適任撫養這個孩子。請就這一點特別的加以闡述，好嗎？此外，我知道你們這一件，也正在打離婚案件，所以希望雙方盡量不要發生在言語上攻擊對方的情況。了解嗎？

Today, I want to understand the viewpoints of child rearing for both sides. The court will also figure out why both sides want the right to raise child. Please make more statements at this point, OK? In addition to this case, the court also knew that you were undergoing the divorce case. Both sides should avoid verbal attack on the court. Do you fully understand?
I understand.
是的，我了解
了解。
I understand.
請問告訴人你為什麼希望能夠爭取孩子的撫養權？就我所知，你目前在台灣並沒有全職的工作，又因為你本人是外國人的身分，在爭取子女撫養權一事上，你為什麼認為你比較適任呢？

Explain why you urged to get child rearing right. So far you don’t have the full time job in Taiwan. Basically, you are the foreigner. In this case, why did you think you have the better right to get this?

I hope to be granted with the sole custody of my daughter because of two concerns. First, my wife no longer lives with us. I want to be there to see my daughter grow up. Moreover, I have heard that my wife is living with another man. If that is the case, I doubt it very much that she can give our daughter the best care she deserves. Therefore, I hope to have the sole custody.
我希望能把所有的撫養權判給我，因為有兩個原因，首先，我太太沒有和我們住在一起，我希望能看到我女兒在這邊長大。此外，我聽到消息說我老婆和別的男人住在一起，如果情況真的如此，那我懷疑我女兒能否得到最完善的照顧，因此，我希望能得到所有的撫養權。
你的意思是說，因為你太太雖然目前還在跟你打離婚官司，可是她已經沒有跟你同住，而且你還懷疑她與其他男子同居。因為這種情況，你不願意把你們的孩子交給她照顧，是這樣子的嗎？

In other words, your wife lived with another man when you had the divorce case. Besides, you also have the doubt she lives with another man. Under this circumstance, you are not willing to give the sole custody to her.
Yes, those are my main concerns.
是的，這些就是我主要的考量
另外，那麼對於你個人的經濟能力，也就是你如果能到子女撫養權，你打算要怎麼照顧你的女兒？
Concerning about the financial status, if you get the custody, what will you do?

It is true that I don’t currently hold a full-time job. However, I have several part-time jobs which bring me a regular income. I believe that income will be sufficient for me to take care of myself and my daughter.
的確，我現在沒有拿到一個全職工作，但是我有幾份兼職的工作，可以讓我保持一個穩定的收入，我相信這個金錢來源，足夠讓我養活我們
你剛剛提到你目前有好幾份兼職工作，因為它們本身都是兼職的性質，你能夠保守估計自己每個月會有多少的固定收入嗎？
You just mention you have several part-time jobs. Because those are part-time jobs, can you tell the amount conservatively?
I have, on average, four to five part-time jobs. As a total, they will bring me about NT$50,000 per month. Sometimes, if I have new projects, I may be able to have more income.
我大概有四到五份兼職工作，全部總計每個月大概可以有五萬的收入，如果有接到新的企劃，說不定能賺更多。
另外我想要問的問題，是關於你有沒有可能在得到孩子撫養權後，把孩子帶回加拿大，就不回來了呢？我會這樣問，主要是因為，即使你拿到撫養權，你太太還是可能可以保有探視權，如果你把小孩子帶回你的國家，就會變成是變相的隔離她們母女見面。對這一點，你有什麼意見。

So, another question would be that if you get the sole custody with your daughter, would you bring her to Canada and stay in Canada forever and would not come back to Taiwan? The reason why I ask this question is that even though you get the custody, your wife still has the visitation right to see your daughter. If you bring your daughter to Canada, it will become that you isolate your daughter from your wife. At this point, what is your opinion?

I have stayed in Taiwan for five years already. I have an ARC and I like this place. So far, I don’t have any plan to leave Taiwan. Especially, I believe that my daughter should have the opportunity to see both of her parents. I want to emphasize that although my wife and I are currently seeking a divorce, I have no intention of cutting the tie between her and my daughter. During the entire period of our divorce case, I have regularly sent our daughter’s pictures to my wife. I even arranged outings to encourage her to spend time with us, me and our daughter.
我已在台灣待了四五年，我有居留證也喜歡這個地方，目前為止，我沒有任何計畫打算離開台灣。我認為我女兒有權可以看到我們雙方，我想強調的是即便我和我老婆在打離婚官司，但沒有打算切斷她們母女之間的關係。在整個離婚訴訟中，我也常寄女兒的圖片給我妻子看，我甚至還計畫讓她和女兒一起出遊，讓他多看看我們的女兒
所以你的意思是指，在近期之內你並沒有返回母國的打算，是這樣嗎？
What you mean is that you have no intention to come back to Canada, Right?
No, I may go back to Canada because my mother is old and sick. However, even if I go back, I wouldn’t stay long. I won’t even consider the possibility of taking my daughter with me.
有可能回加拿大也可能是因為我母親又老又病，所以我必須得回去，就算我回去，也不會待太久，我不會考慮帶我女兒回去的可能。
那接下來我要請問相對人，請問你現在已經沒有跟先生同住了嗎？
I will ask questions for the other side. You did not live with your husband, right?
對，我們已經分居六個月了。
We are separated for at least six months.
請問妳是什麼時候提出離婚訴訟的。
When did you file the divorce case?
我大概是兩個月前提的。
About two months ago.
也就是說，早在你提出離婚訴訟之前，你們就已經沒有住在一起了。
That is to say is that before you file the case, you did not live together, right?
是的。
Yes
那請問妳現在的居住狀況如何？我指的是，跟誰住？
So, let me ask you about your living status. I mean whom do you live with?
我帶著第一任婚姻的兒子一起住。
I live with my son who is born in my first marriage.
第一任婚姻？那你跟告訴人的婚姻是第幾次？
First marriage? What is the marriage with the defendant?
他是我第二任先生。
He is my second husband.
所以現在爭的子女撫養權，是你跟第二任先生的小孩？是個女兒？
So, you are fighting for the child rearing right. Who is the child you fight with your husband?
對。
Yes
你的兒子幾歲了？女兒幾歲了？
How old is your son? How old is your daughter.
我兒子7歲了，我女兒8個月大。
My son is seven years old. My daughter is eight months.
那你搬出去住的時候，女兒是跟你、還是跟他？
When you leave out home, did your daughter come with you?
因為我搬出去的時候，女兒只有2個月大，還很需要我的照顧，所以孩子跟我。
When I left out home, I bring my daughter with me because she was just two months old at that time.
那現在孩子在誰那裏？
Who live with your daughter?
現在女兒在我先生那裏。
My daughter lives with my husband.
你們中間有什麼協議嗎，為什麼原來女兒跟你，現在跟他。
Is there any agreement between you and him? Originally, your daughter lives with you. Why did your daughter live with him now?
我搬出來住的地方比較小，原來跟先生的房子比較大。環境上來說，對孩子比較優，所以我把孩子交給先生。
The place I live so far is small. Originally, our house was much bigger.Concerning for the environment, I think my husband’s house is better. I get my daughter to him.
那如果客觀條件沒有改變的話，你的居住環境，對你女兒仍然比較不好，不是嗎？那為什麼會希望能夠爭取子女撫養權呢
For the objective circumstance, what I mean is that if your place has no change, it would be not good for your daughter. Why did you want to get the custody?
她是我懷胎十個月生下來的阿，我怎麼捨得以後都看不到她呢？而且我先生是加拿大籍，他在台灣的工作也沒有很穩定，隨時有可能會回去加拿大，那這樣子的話，我不就見不到女兒了嗎？所以我希望能夠爭取女兒的撫養權。

She is my daughter with hard effort. How could I live without her? Besides, my husband is Canadian and his job is not stable. He has high possibility of coming back to Canada. In this way, I may not see my daughter anymore. Therefore, I want to get the custody.
就妳的經濟能力而言，你可以加以說明如何負擔女兒的撫養費用嗎？
For your finical status, could you explain how you afford your daughter’s raising fee?
我們目前還在打離婚官司，我希望能夠爭取到離婚之後能住在我先生現居的那棟房子裡，所以就環境來講，那棟房子會很適合我女兒成長。至於我個人的經濟能力，我有提供給法院一份目前我的財產表，除此之外，我也有固定的工作，一個月收入至少是4萬以上。我想我有能力撫養、照顧我的女兒。

So far we are in the progress of divorce case. I want to ask where my husband lives so far. For the finical status, I think that house will be suitable for my daughter. 請問你們目前的離婚案件進行地如何？有預定什麼時候判決會出來嗎？或是說，大概什麼時候判決會出來？
I want to the progress of your divorce case. Do you know when will the court make the judge or which day they will give answer?
我不太確定，我們這個禮拜五還會再出庭一次，可是我希望能夠向離婚案件的法官表達，希望判決能夠盡快出來。
I am not sure about that. We have to go to the court this Friday. I will send my concern to judge who is undergoing our case.
這樣好了，本院會安排社工人員造訪告訴人跟相對人雙方，並且針對你們與孩子的相處情況做出評估，本庭會參考他們的報告，來決定怎麼樣的安排對孩子是最好的。不過在那之前，想先請問一下，你們雙方會考慮共同持有撫養權嗎？所謂的共同撫養，是指孩子一段時間跟父親、另外一段時間跟母親。

OK, the court will send social workers to both sides to see our status. They will make the evaluation about how good is daughter to one side. 我個人不太喜歡這樣的建議，因為我們女兒還小，他現在只有八個月大，我不希望她經歷在父母之間的轉換。對這麼小的兒童而言，一下子和爸爸住，一下又跟媽媽住，這對他們是困擾混淆的
在這點上面，我同意我先生的看法。女兒還太小，不應該、也不適合共同撫養的安排方式。
At this point, I am agree with my husband. Our daughter is too young, she is not able to or supposed to live this kind of environment.
既然如此，那麼我們就先進行社工探視的安排。等到他們做出報告，我們再安排庭期，讓雙方有陳述意見的機會。這樣可以嗎？
In this way, the court will send social workers. After they make full report, we will arrange the date of court. By doing so, both sides have rights to make statements, is that right?
Yes, I am fine with social workers’ visits.
我可以接受社工拜訪
沒有問題，謝謝。
I have no further question about that.

這樣好了，本院會安排社工人員造訪告訴人跟相對人雙方，並且針對你們與孩子的相處情況做出評估，本庭會參考他們的報告，來決定怎麼樣的安排對孩子是最好的。不過在那之前，想先請問一下，你們雙方會考慮共同持有撫養權嗎？所謂的共同撫養，是指孩子一段時間跟父親、另外一段時間跟母親。

Now let us do this. The court will arrange social workers to your children. And they will make evaluation about the relationship between you and your child. The definition of shared custody is that the child stays with father for some time and stays with the mother for another time.

Personally, I do not favor this arrangement because my daughter is still too small. She is only 8 months old. I don’t want her to go through the changes between me and my wife. For a child at such a young age, it is too confusing for her if she has to stay with one parent for some time and another for another period of time.
我個人不喜歡這個提案，因為我女兒還太小，他只有八個月大。我不希望他在我和我太太之間搬來搬去。這個方式對這麼年幼的小孩來說太混淆了，怎麼可以讓她一下跟爸爸住一下跟媽媽住呢
在這點上面，我同意我先生的看法。女兒還太小，不應該、也不適合共同撫養的安排方式。
Concerning this point, I agree with my husband. Our daughter is too small. She is not supposed to go through the process of shared custody.
既然如此，那麼我們就先進行社工探視的安排。等到他們做出報告，我們再安排庭期，讓雙方有陳述意見的機會。這樣可以嗎？
So we will have the social workers get to you first. After they finish the report, we will arrange the court date to give the opinion rights of both parties.
Yes, I am fine with social workers’ visits.
我對社工探視沒有意見
沒有問題，謝謝。
I’m fine with it too, thanks.

今天我們進行Ferry Johnson與史彩雲之子女撫養權之準備程序。請問雙方都有請辯護人嗎？
Today we are here for preparation procedure between Ferry Johnson and TSAI YUN SHR of their child rearing. Do both parties have the lawyers?
我有委託律師。
I have a lawyer.
I also have a lawyer.
我也有請任律師。
今天的準備程序中，我主要希望了解雙方在子女撫養權上的立場，也希望能夠知道為什麼你們各自認為自己比較適任撫養這個孩子。請就這一點特別的加以闡述，好嗎？此外，我知道你們這一件，也正在打離婚案件，所以希望雙方盡量不要發生在言語上攻擊對方的情況。了解嗎？

Today, we just want to know the both parties’ status of this case. We also want to know why both parties think they are more suitable for child rearing. Please just state for this point. And, I know you just in the case of divorce. In the court, we don’t want to see verbal attack.
I understand.
是的，我了解。
了解。
Yes, I understand.
請問告訴人你為什麼希望能夠爭取孩子的撫養權？就我所知，你目前在台灣並沒有全職的工作，又因為你本人是外國人的身分，在爭取子女撫養權一事上，你為什麼認為你比較適任呢？

First, I want to ask the questions. Plaintiff, why do you want to have the custody of your child? As I know, you don’t have full-time job now in Taiwan. And you are a foreigner. Why would you think you are more suitable for this case?

I hope to be granted with the sole custody of my daughter because of two concerns. First, my wife no longer lives with us. I want to be there to see my daughter grow up. Moreover, I have heard that my wife is living with another man. If that is the case, I doubt it very much that she can give our daughter the best care she deserves. Therefore, I hope to have the sole custody.
我希望得到孩子的扶養權因為下列的原因。首先，我的老婆不再陪著我們。我想要跟著我的女兒一起成長。此外，我知道我的老婆和別的男人現在正在一起。如果那是真的，我很懷疑我的老婆是否有辦法好好照顧我們的女兒。因此，我希望能爭取全部扶養權。
你的意思是說，因為你太太雖然目前還在跟你打離婚官司，可是她已經沒有跟你同住，而且你還懷疑她與其他男子同居。因為這種情況，你不願意把你們的孩子交給她照顧，是這樣子的嗎？

You mean that you are in the case of divorce with your wife, and she doesn’t live with you now? And you think she lives with other man? Because of this concern, you don’t want to your child lives with her?
Yes, those are my main concerns.
沒錯，那就是我所擔憂的。
另外，那麼對於你個人的經濟能力，也就是你如果能到子女撫養權，你打算要怎麼照顧你的女兒？
Furthermore, it’s about your financial status. If you have the custody of your child, what’s your plan?

It is true that I don’t currently hold a full-time job. However, I have several part-time jobs which bring me a regular income. I believe that income will be sufficient for me to take care of myself and my daughter.
沒錯，我現在在台灣並沒有全職的工作。但是我有七份兼職工作，那使我的收入跟全職收入一樣多。我相信這樣的收入足夠負擔我和我女兒的生活費。
你剛剛提到你目前有好幾份兼職工作，因為它們本身都是兼職的性質，你能夠保守估計自己每個月會有多少的固定收入嗎？
You just mention that you have many part time jobs. Because all of them are part time jobs, you think you may have how much fixed income every month?
I have, on average, four to five part-time jobs. As a total, they will bring me about NT$50,000 per month. Sometimes, if I have new projects, I may be able to have more income.
我平均有四到五份兼職工作。平均來說，我一個月會有五萬元收入。有時候如果我額外接收到工作，我會有更多的收入。
另外我想要問的問題，是關於你有沒有可能在得到孩子撫養權後，把孩子帶回加拿大，就不回來了呢？我會這樣問，主要是因為，即使你拿到撫養權，你太太還是可能可以保有探視權，如果你把小孩子帶回你的國家，就會變成是變相的隔離她們母女見面。對這一點，你有什麼意見。

For the other question that I want to ask is that if you get the custody of your child, will you go to Canada and never come back again? I asked the question just because even if you have the custody, your wife may remain the visitation right. If you bring your child to your country, it may become a problem that you deliberately separate the child and your wife. For this point, what’s your point?

I have stayed in Taiwan for five years already. I have an ARC and I like this place. So far, I don’t have any plan to leave Taiwan. Especially, I believe that my daughter should have the opportunity to see both of her parents. I want to emphasize that although my wife and I are currently seeking a divorce, I have no intention of cutting the tie between her and my daughter. During the entire period of our divorce case, I have regularly sent our daughter’s pictures to my wife. I even arranged outings to encourage her to spend time with us, me and our daughter.
我已經在台灣生活了五年，我擁有居留證而且我喜愛這個地方，到目前為止我沒有離開台灣的任何打算，而且我的女兒有權利見到我和我太太。我必須強調的是，即使我和我太太正在進行離婚官司，但我並沒有想要切斷小孩和我太太的關係。在打官司的期間，我也有將我女兒的照片傳給我老婆。我甚至鼓勵他和我女兒見面。
所以你的意思是指，在近期之內你並沒有返回母國的打算，是這樣嗎？
So, you mean that you don’t have the plan to go back your country, right?
No, I may go back to Canada because my mother is old and sick. However, even if I go back, I wouldn’t stay long. I won’t even consider the possibility of taking my daughter with me.
也不是這樣說，我也是有可能回去看我的母親，因為她已經很老了。就算我回去的話，我也不會在那邊待很久，我甚至考慮帶我女兒一起去的可能性。
那接下來我要請問相對人，請問你現在已經沒有跟先生同住了嗎？
Ok. I want to ask the question of the other party. So, do you live with your husband now?
對，我們已經分居六個月了。
We live separately for six months.
請問妳是什麼時候提出離婚訴訟的。
When did you file a divorce case?
我大概是兩個月前提的。
Maybe two months before.
也就是說，早在你提出離婚訴訟之前，你們就已經沒有住在一起了。
So, before you filed the case, you didn’t live with your husband?
是的。
Yes.
那請問妳現在的居住狀況如何？我指的是，跟誰住？
What’s you living status? I mean, you live with whom?
我帶著第一任婚姻的兒子一起住。
I live with my son who is from my first marriage.
第一任婚姻？那你跟告訴人的婚姻是第幾次？
First marriage?
他是我第二任先生。
He is my second husband
所以現在爭的子女撫養權，是你跟第二任先生的小孩？是個女兒？
So, the custody that we concern about is between your second husband and you?
對。
Yes.
你的兒子幾歲了？女兒幾歲了？
How old is your son? And how old is your daughter?
我兒子7歲了，我女兒8個月大。
My son is seven years old. My daughter is eight months.
那你搬出去住的時候，女兒是跟你、還是跟他？
When you went out, your daughter lived with you or your husband?
因為我搬出去的時候，女兒只有2個月大，還很需要我的照顧，所以孩子跟我。
Because when I went out, my daughter was only 2 months, she needed me and she lived with me.
那現在孩子在誰那裏？
Now, the child lives with whom?
現在女兒在我先生那裏。
Now, my daughter lives with my husband.
你們中間有什麼協議嗎，為什麼原來女兒跟你，現在跟他。
Do you have any agreement? Why your daughter lived with you first, and now she lives with your husband?
我搬出來住的地方比較小，原來跟先生的房子比較大。環境上來說，對孩子比較優，所以我把孩子交給先生。
The place that I live now is not big so my child lives with my husband. For environmental concern, my daughter lives with my husband now.
那如果客觀條件沒有改變的話，你的居住環境，對你女兒仍然比較不好，不是嗎？那為什麼會希望能夠爭取子女撫養權呢
Just for the objective circumstances, the situation for your daughter is not good, right? Why would you have the custody of your child?
她是我懷胎十個月生下來的阿，我怎麼捨得以後都看不到她呢？而且我先生是加拿大籍，他在台灣的工作也沒有很穩定，隨時有可能會回去加拿大，那這樣子的話，我不就見不到女兒了嗎？所以我希望能夠爭取女兒的撫養權。

She is my child, how could I live without her? Furthermore, my husband is a Canadian, and he might go back to Canada any time. If that’s a case, I cannot meet my daughter anymore. So, I want to have the custody.
就妳的經濟能力而言，你可以加以說明如何負擔女兒的撫養費用嗎？
For your financial status, can you explain more that how would you rear your child?
我們目前還在打離婚官司，我希望能夠爭取到離婚之後能住在我先生現居的那棟房子裡，所以就環境來講，那棟房子會很適合我女兒成長。至於我個人的經濟能力，我有提供給法院一份目前我的財產表，除此之外，我也有固定的工作，一個月收入至少是4萬以上。我想我有能力撫養、照顧我的女兒。

We are in divorce case now. I hope, after the case, I can live in the house that my husband lives now. The house is good for my daughter to grow up. For my financial status, I just turned in my asset list for the court. Furthermore, I have a job, and the income is NT40000 each month. I think I can be capable of rearing my child.
請問你們目前的離婚案件進行地如何？有預定什麼時候判決會出來嗎？或是說，大概什麼時候判決會出來？
How’s your divorce case now? When will the sentence out?
我不太確定，我們這個禮拜五還會再出庭一次，可是我希望能夠向離婚案件的法官表達，希望判決能夠盡快出來。
I am not sure. This Friday, we will go to the court again. I want to tell the judge who charges our divorce case that I hope the sentence out fast.
這樣好了，本院會安排社工人員造訪告訴人跟相對人雙方，並且針對你們與孩子的相處情況做出評估，本庭會參考他們的報告，來決定怎麼樣的安排對孩子是最好的。不過在那之前，想先請問一下，你們雙方會考慮共同持有撫養權嗎？所謂的共同撫養，是指孩子一段時間跟父親、另外一段時間跟母親。

Ok, so, the court will arrange the social workers to visit both parties. And the social workers will evaluate the situation. After the court sees the report, we will think who is better for the child. But before that, do both parties want to share the custody? The term of shared custody means that sometimes the child lives with father and sometimes lives with mother.

Personally, I do not favor this arrangement because my daughter is still too small. She is only 8 months old. I don’t want her to go through the changes between me and my wife. For a child at such a young age, it is too confusing for her if she has to stay with one parent for some time and another for another period of time.
就目前來說，我並不想這麼打算，因為我的小孩還太小。她只有八個月大，我不希望她一直在我和我老婆之間來來回回。對於這麼小的小孩來說，對於她一下要來這邊一下要去那邊，會讓她感到困擾。
在這點上面，我同意我先生的看法。女兒還太小，不應該、也不適合共同撫養的安排方式。
For this point, I agree with my husband. Our daughter is too small, and it’s not suitable for shared custody.
既然如此，那麼我們就先進行社工探視的安排。等到他們做出報告，我們再安排庭期，讓雙方有陳述意見的機會。這樣可以嗎？
We will arrange social workers’ visitation first. After they finish the report, we will set the next court date. Both parties will have chance to state, is that ok?
Yes, I am fine with social workers’ visits.
是的，我對於社工參訪沒有意見。
沒有問題，謝謝。
Yes.

我帶著第一任婚姻的兒子一起住。
I’m living with my son from my first marriage.
第一任婚姻？那你跟告訴人的婚姻是第幾次？
Your first marriage? So, the marriage between you and the….defendant…which…
他是我第二任先生。
He is my second husband.
所以現在爭的子女撫養權，是你跟第二任先生的小孩？是個女兒？
So the custody that you both are seeking…. is for your second child, your daughter?
對。
Yes.
你的兒子幾歲了？女兒幾歲了？
How old is your son? And how old is your daughter?
我兒子7歲了，我女兒8個月大。
My son is seven years old, and my daughter is eight months old.
那你搬出去住的時候，女兒是跟你、還是跟他？
When you moved out, did your daughter stay with the father or with you?
因為我搬出去的時候，女兒只有2個月大，還很需要我的照顧，所以孩子跟我。
When I moved out, the child was only six months old and needed me to take care of her, so she went with me.
那現在孩子在誰那裏？
And who is the child with at this moment?
現在女兒在我先生那裏。
Now the child is with my husband.
你們中間有什麼協議嗎，為什麼原來女兒跟你，現在跟他。
Have you reached any sort of agreement? Why was the daughter with you at the first point, and now with… the husband?
我搬出來住的地方比較小，原來跟先生的房子比較大。環境上來說，對孩子比較優，所以我把孩子交給先生。
My accommodation when I moved out is smaller than before. Considering the environment…the living environment, the old house was better, so I sent my daughter back.
那如果客觀條件沒有改變的話，你的居住環境，對你女兒仍然比較不好，不是嗎？那為什麼會希望能夠爭取子女撫養權呢
So if the objective circumstances, or the living environment has changed, it’s not good for your daughter either, isn’t it? Then why would you want to fight for your child’s custody?
她是我懷胎十個月生下來的阿，我怎麼捨得以後都看不到她呢？而且我先生是加拿大籍，他在台灣的工作也沒有很穩定，隨時有可能會回去加拿大，那這樣子的話，我不就見不到女兒了嗎？所以我希望能夠爭取女兒的撫養權。

I bore her for ten months! How could I even consider leaving her? Besides, my husband is a Canadian citizen. He doesn’t even have a stable job. If so, I might never see my daughter again. So I wish to… to receive custody for my child.
就妳的經濟能力而言，你可以加以說明如何負擔女兒的撫養費用嗎？
Concerning your financial status, can you elaborate…more about how you will take care of your daughter?
我們目前還在打離婚官司，我希望能夠爭取到離婚之後能住在我先生現居的那棟房子裡，所以就環境來講，那棟房子會很適合我女兒成長。至於我個人的經濟能力，我有提供給法院一份目前我的財產表，除此之外，我也有固定的工作，一個月收入至少是4萬以上。我想我有能力撫養、照顧我的女兒。

We are still in the middle of our divorce case. I wish to receive the house that my husband is living in right now. That would be a better environment for my daughter to grow up in. And about my financial status, I provided the court with my asset list. I also have a fixed job. I earn 40 thousand dollars each month. Or more. I think I’m capable of taking care of my daughter.
請問你們目前的離婚案件進行地如何？有預定什麼時候判決會出來嗎？或是說，大概什麼時候判決會出來？
How is your divorce case going? Have you estimated what time the courts decision will come out?
我不太確定，我們這個禮拜五還會再出庭一次，可是我希望能夠向離婚案件的法官表達，希望判決能夠盡快出來。
I’m not sure. We will come to court again this Friday. I wish to tell the judge of the divorce case that I would like to see the results of the divorce case come out sooner.
這樣好了，本院會安排社工人員造訪告訴人跟相對人雙方，並且針對你們與孩子的相處情況做出評估，本庭會參考他們的報告，來決定怎麼樣的安排對孩子是最好的。不過在那之前，想先請問一下，你們雙方會考慮共同持有撫養權嗎？所謂的共同撫養，是指孩子一段時間跟父親、另外一段時間跟母親。

How about this, the court will send a social worker to visit both parties. Then they will evaluate the situation of both parties to see if they are fit to take care of the child. The report will be considered by the court to make the decision. But prior to that, I would like to ask if you consider…a shared custody? Shared custody entails that the child for a period of time stays with the father, and another period stays with the mother.

Personally, I do not favor this arrangement because my daughter is still too small. She is only 8 months old. I don’t want her to go through the changes between me and my wife. For a child at such a young age, it is too confusing for her if she has to stay with one parent for some time and another for another period of time.
我個人比較不偏好這個選擇，因為我的女兒年紀還太小。她只有八個月大。不希望她承受…這樣子的變化。對一個年紀這麼小的孩子來說，她會感到太困惑了，如果她有一段時間與一個人同住，然後另一段時間又搬去另一個地方。
在這點上面，我同意我先生的看法。女兒還太小，不應該、也不適合共同撫養的安排方式。
On this, I agree with my husband. Our daughter is too young. It is not suitable to…for shared custody.
既然如此，那麼我們就先進行社工探視的安排。等到他們做出報告，我們再安排庭期，讓雙方有陳述意見的機會。這樣可以嗎？
OK, after that, let’s consider the social worker…visit. After they have devised a report, we will plan a date to come to court to give both of you an opportunity to elaborate on your decisions.
Yes, I am fine with social workers’ visits.
好，沒問題。
沒有問題，謝謝。
I have no problem with the decision either, thank you.

通譯宣讀 「通譯結文：今為貴院親字2345號 子女撫養權案件之準備程序為通譯，謹當為公正誠實之譯述，此結，通譯○○○，中華民國103年4月28日。」

I’m here for the child rearing case, case number 2345 as an interpreter. I promise to faithfully and honestly translate/interpret what is stated in this court. In the case of deliberately making false interpretation, the violation of perjury will apply.
告訴人姓名
Your name?
Ferry Johnson
強森 梅利。
護照號碼
Your passport number?
居留證號碼
Your ARC number?
聯絡地址

Fl. 24-3, No. 482, Te-hsin East Road, Shih-lin District, Taipei
台北市士林區德行東路482號24樓之3
告知權利義務
Plaintiff, you have the following rights and obligations.
1.你有權保持緘默，毋需違背意志做任何陳述。
You have the right to remain silent and do not have to make any statement against your will.
2.你有權選任法定辯護人2
You have the right to a lawyer.
3.你有權請法院調查任何對你有利的證據。
You have the right the ask the court to investigate any evidence which may help you with your case.
相對人是否了解以上權利？
Do you fully understand you rights?
Yes, I understand.

Floor number 5, number 414, section 3, Chung cheng road, shihling district, Taipei city.
今天我們進行Ferry Johnson與史彩雲之子女撫養權之準備程序。請問雙方都有請辯護人嗎？
Today, we’re here for the preparatory procedure between Madam Shih Tsai Yun and Ferry Johnson. Have both of you asked for a lawyer?
我有委託律師。
Yes, I have asked a lawyer to help me.
I also have a lawyer.
我也有請。
今天的準備程序中，我主要希望了解雙方在子女撫養權上的立場，也希望能夠知道為什麼你們各自認為自己比較適任撫養這個孩子。請就這一點特別的加以闡述，好嗎？此外，我知道你們這一件，也正在打離婚案件，所以希望雙方盡量不要發生在言語上攻擊對方的情況。了解嗎？

Today, the judge here wants to know more about the perspective of each party about child rearing. The judge also wants to know why both of you consider yourselves the most appropriate one to rear this child, so please elaborate this point, do you understand? In addition, I know that both of you are trying to get a divorce. Therefore, I do not wish to see that both of you have a verbal attack against each other. Do you understand?
I understand.
好，是的。
了解。
Okay.
請問告訴人你為什麼希望能夠爭取孩子的撫養權？就我所知，你目前在台灣並沒有全職的工作，又因為你本人是外國人的身分，在爭取子女撫養權一事上，你為什麼認為你比較適任呢？

Okay now, I have some questions to ask the plaintiff. Please tell me the reasons why you wish to rear your child. According the information I’ve received, you do not have a full-time job in Taiwan, and you’re a foreigner, so why do you consider yourself the most appropriate person to have child custody?

I hope to be granted with the sole custody of my daughter because of two concerns. First, my wife no longer lives with us. I want to be there to see my daughter grow up. Moreover, I have heard that my wife is living with another man. If that is the case, I doubt it very much that she can give our daughter the best care she deserves. Therefore, I hope to have the sole custody.
現在有兩個原因去支持為什麼我比較適任於擁有子女撫養權。首先，我已經沒有和太太住在一起了，我想看著孩子長大。而且我還聽說我的太太和別的男人住在一起了。若是這樣的話，她應該不會給予我女兒真正應得的關愛。因此，我適任得到全部的撫養權。
你的意思是說，因為你太太雖然目前還在跟你打離婚官司，可是她已經沒有跟你同住，而且你還懷疑她與其他男子同居。因為這種情況，你不願意把你們的孩子交給她照顧，是這樣子的嗎？

So do you mean that now, you’re preparing for a divorce, and your wife is no longer living with you, and you suspect her of living with another guy. Due to the situation like this, you do not wish to let her take care of the child, is that so?
Yes, those are my main concerns.
是啊，這就是我主要的原因。
另外，那麼對於你個人的經濟能力，也就是你如果能到子女撫養權，你打算要怎麼照顧你的女兒？
Okay, then if…umm..according to your financial status, and if you really do receive the sole custody, then how are you planning to take care of the child?

It is true that I don’t currently hold a full-time job. However, I have several part-time jobs which bring me a regular income. I believe that income will be sufficient for me to take care of myself and my daughter.
我現在確實沒有全職工作。但是，我好幾個間質的工作，因此，我有固定的收入。這些收入足以養活我自己和我的女兒。
你剛剛提到你目前有好幾份兼職工作，因為它們本身都是兼職的性質，你能夠保守估計自己每個月會有多少的固定收入嗎？
You’ve just mentioned about that you have several part-time jobs. Due to they are part-time jobs in their nature, can you tell me an estimated income per month?
I have, on average, four to five part-time jobs. As a total, they will bring me about NT$50,000 per month. Sometimes, if I have new projects, I may be able to have more income.
平均來說，我有四到五份兼職工作。總共來說，我每個月會賺進五萬台幣。若我有找到其他工作的話，我的收入會高於五萬。
另外我想要問的問題，是關於你有沒有可能在得到孩子撫養權後，把孩子帶回加拿大，就不回來了呢？我會這樣問，主要是因為，即使你拿到撫養權，你太太還是可能可以保有探視權，如果你把小孩子帶回你的國家，就會變成是變相的隔離她們母女見面。對這一點，你有什麼意見。

Another question that I would like to ask you is once you receive the child custody, is it possible that you would just take the child to Canada and never come back? The reason why I asked you this is that even of you receive the sole custody, your wife still has the visitation right. So if you do this, if you just take the child to Canada with you, then it means that you just cut the ties between your daughter and your wife. So, according to this problem, what would you like to say?

I have stayed in Taiwan for five years already. I have an ARC and I like this place. So far, I don’t have any plan to leave Taiwan. Especially, I believe that my daughter should have the opportunity to see both of her parents. I want to emphasize that although my wife and I are currently seeking a divorce, I have no intention of cutting the tie between her and my daughter. During the entire period of our divorce case, I have regularly sent our daughter’s pictures to my wife. I even arranged outings to encourage her to spend time with us, me and our daughter.
我在台灣已經待了五年了吧。我有居留證號碼，而且我喜歡這個地方。目前為止，我是沒有要離開台灣的打算。而且我有認為我女兒應該要擁有見雙方父母的權利。縱使我和我太太目前正辦理離婚，但是，我不打算要切斷她們之間的關係。在我們辦理離婚手續的過程當中，我常常會將我女兒的照片給我太太看。我甚至會辦一些活動啊，或是約。。。我們大家一起出去。
所以你的意思是指，在近期之內你並沒有返回母國的打算，是這樣嗎？
Okay, so you mean that currently, you do not have any plans to return to your mother country?
No, I may go back to Canada because my mother is old and sick. However, even if I go back, I wouldn’t stay long. I won’t even consider the possibility of taking my daughter with me.
恩，不不不，我是有可能回加拿大，因為我母親現在生病啦。但縱使我回去加拿大，我也不會長期待在那裡。我應該也不會想要把我女兒帶那裡。
那接下來我要請問相對人，請問你現在已經沒有跟先生同住了嗎？
Okay, now, I would like to ask the other party some questions. Are you still living with your husband or not?
對，我們已經分居六個月了。
Well, we’re not living together anymore for six months.
請問妳是什麼時候提出離婚訴訟的。
When did you ask for a divorce?
我大概是兩個月前提的。
About a month ago, I think.
也就是說，早在你提出離婚訴訟之前，你們就已經沒有住在一起了。
Okay, that means before you asked for a divorce, you two have not been living together, right?
是的。
Yes, that’s right.
那請問妳現在的居住狀況如何？我指的是，跟誰住？
So, who are you living with now? What’s the condition now?
我帶著第一任婚姻的兒子一起住。
I live with the former husband’s son.
第一任婚姻？那你跟告訴人的婚姻是第幾次？
Oh, your former husband….first marriage? Then, how about the husband you have now?
他是我第二任先生。
Well, he’s my second husband.
所以現在爭的子女撫養權，是你跟第二任先生的小孩？是個女兒？
Now, we’re trying to figure out the custody is about the child you have with your second husband. She’s a daughter?
對。
Yes, that’s right.
你的兒子幾歲了？女兒幾歲了？
Then how old is your son, and how old is your daughter?
我兒子7歲了，我女兒8個月大。
My son is seven years old, and my daughter eight months old.
那你搬出去住的時候，女兒是跟你、還是跟他？
The time when you moved out, your daughter, who did she go with?
因為我搬出去的時候，女兒只有2個月大，還很需要我的照顧，所以孩子跟我。
At that time, my daughter was only two months old; therefore, she needs my care, so she stayed with me.
那現在孩子在誰那裏？
And now, who is she staying with?
現在女兒在我先生那裏。
Now, she’s staying with my husband.
你們中間有什麼協議嗎，為什麼原來女兒跟你，現在跟他。
Did you have any pact between each other? Why does your daughter stayed with you, and then, she’s staying with your husband now?
我搬出來住的地方比較小，原來跟先生的房子比較大。環境上來說，對孩子比較優，所以我把孩子交給先生。

The place where I moved out to live is a bit small, and the place where my husband lives is quite large. Therefore, due to the environment and circumstances, I just wished my daughter to live with him.
那如果客觀條件沒有改變的話，你的居住環境，對你女兒仍然比較不好，不是嗎？那為什麼會希望能夠爭取子女撫養權呢
Okay, so if the objective circumstances do not change, then is your place still not better than your husband’s? Then why did you wish to receive the child’s sole custody?
她是我懷胎十個月生下來的阿，我怎麼捨得以後都看不到她呢？而且我先生是加拿大籍，他在台灣的工作也沒有很穩定，隨時有可能會回去加拿大，那這樣子的話，我不就見不到女兒了嗎？所以我希望能夠爭取女兒的撫養權。

Hey, I am the one who bear her for ten months, I can’t live without her. Moreover, my husband is a Canadian, he does not have a fixed income, and he even has the possibility to return to Canada. If so, then I’ll lose the right to visit my daughter. Therefore, I’m here to gain for the custody.
就妳的經濟能力而言，你可以加以說明如何負擔女兒的撫養費用嗎？
In terms of your financial status, can you describe how you would raise the child?
我們目前還在打離婚官司，我希望能夠爭取到離婚之後能住在我先生現居的那棟房子裡，所以就環境來講，那棟房子會很適合我女兒成長。至於我個人的經濟能力，我有提供給法院一份目前我的財產表，除此之外，我也有固定的工作，一個月收入至少是4萬以上。我想我有能力撫養、照顧我的女兒。

Now, we’re still trying to divorce, and I would like to get the right of living in the place where my husband is now living. Therefore, in terms of the environment there, it would be perfect for my daughter to grow up. As for my current financial status, I have let the court see my asset list. Moreover, I have a very regular income and a very stable job. My monthly income would be no less than forty thousand. Therefore, I believe that I have the ability to take care of my daughter.
請問你們目前的離婚案件進行地如何？有預定什麼時候判決會出來嗎？或是說，大概什麼時候判決會出來？
Okay, so how is your divorce case going on? Do you know why you will get the verdict, approximately when?
我不太確定，我們這個禮拜五還會再出庭一次，可是我希望能夠向離婚案件的法官表達，希望判決能夠盡快出來。
Well, I’m not sure. We’ll go to the court this Friday again. I would like to ask the court to make a decision of the verdict sooner.
這樣好了，本院會安排社工人員造訪告訴人跟相對人雙方，並且針對你們與孩子的相處情況做出評估，本庭會參考他們的報告，來決定怎麼樣的安排對孩子是最好的。不過在那之前，想先請問一下，你們雙方會考慮共同持有撫養權嗎？所謂的共同撫養，是指孩子一段時間跟父親、另外一段時間跟母親。

The court will ask social workers to visit the home of both parties and make an evaluation of each of your ways of taking care of the child. And the court will decide according their report of how you take care of the child. Before this, I would like to ask both parties do you mind of having a shared custody? Shared custody means that the child can stay with her father for a while, and stay with her mother for another while

Personally, I do not favor this arrangement because my daughter is still too small. She is only 8 months old. I don’t want her to go through the changes between me and my wife. For a child at such a young age, it is too confusing for her if she has to stay with one parent for some time and another for another period of time.
恩，我不太想要耶，因為我女兒還小。她才八個月大。我不想要她一下子陪我，然後一下子又陪我太太。如果是這樣的狀況的話，我的女兒她這麼小，她會覺得很混亂。
在這點上面，我同意我先生的看法。女兒還太小，不應該、也不適合共同撫養的安排方式。
I agree with my husband’s point. My daughter is too young; therefore, shared custody is not the right choice for us.
既然如此，那麼我們就先進行社工探視的安排。等到他們做出報告，我們再安排庭期，讓雙方有陳述意見的機會。這樣可以嗎？

Okay, if so, then we’ll just begin our progress of sending the social workers. And after receiving their report, we’ll set up a time to open the court again. Therefore, you two will have the chance of making a statement, okay?
Yes, I am fine with social workers’ visits.
恩，好的，社工人員可以來我家。
沒有問題，謝謝。
I have no problem with that, either, thank you.

今天我們進行Ferry Johnson與史彩雲之子女撫養權之準備程序。請問雙方都有請辯護人嗎？
Today, we are here for the preparation procedure of the child rearing between these two parties. Do both parties hire a lawyer?
我有委託律師。
Yes, I have hired a lawyer.
I also have a lawyer.
我也有。
今天的準備程序中，我主要希望了解雙方在子女撫養權上的立場，也希望能夠知道為什麼你們各自認為自己比較適任撫養這個孩子。請就這一點特別的加以闡述，好嗎？此外，我知道你們這一件，也正在打離婚案件，所以希望雙方盡量不要發生在言語上攻擊對方的情況。了解嗎？

Today, the court is to understand the position for these two people in terms of the child rearing. Besides, the court also hopes to know whether you two have the capacity to rear the child. Please elaborate in terms of this point. Besides, we know that you also have the case of divorce about this case. Therefore, we hope that you two will not have verbal attacks with one another and have a quarrel.
I understand.
我了解。
了解。
I understand.
請問告訴人你為什麼希望能夠爭取孩子的撫養權？就我所知，你目前在台灣並沒有全職的工作，又因為你本人是外國人的身分，在爭取子女撫養權一事上，你為什麼認為你比較適任呢？

First, the plaintiff, please, why do you want to have the right to rear your child? As the court investigates, you don’t have a formal job in Taiwan. You haven’t had a formal job in Taiwan yet. Beside, you are a foreigner. Why do you think that you have the capacity to take care of your child?

I hope to be granted with the sole custody of my daughter because of two concerns. First, my wife no longer lives with us. I want to be there to see my daughter grow up. Moreover, I have heard that my wife is living with another man. If that is the case, I doubt it very much that she can give our daughter the best care she deserves. Therefore, I hope to have the sole custody.
我希望法院可以判給我全部撫養權，因為兩個原因。首先，我妻子不再跟我一起生活了。我想在這邊看我女兒長大。此外，我還聽說我妻子還跟另外一個男人共處。如果那是真的的話，我就懷疑她是否能撫養我們的女兒。所以我想要有全部的撫養權。
你的意思是說，因為你太太雖然目前還在跟你打離婚官司，可是她已經沒有跟你同住，而且你還懷疑她與其他男子同居。因為這種情況，你不願意把你們的孩子交給她照顧，是這樣子的嗎？

You mean that your wife is not under the same roof with you, and you are dealing with the case about divorce. Besides, you are also suspicious about whether she stays with a other man. Is this the very reason for you to have the sole custody?
Yes, those are my main concerns.
是，這是我的主要原因。
另外，那麼對於你個人的經濟能力，也就是你如果能到子女撫養權，你打算要怎麼照顧你的女兒？
About your financial status, if you get the sole custody of your daughter, how do you rear your daughter?

It is true that I don’t currently hold a full-time job. However, I have several part-time jobs which bring me a regular income. I believe that income will be sufficient for me to take care of myself and my daughter.
我現在沒有全職的工作。但是我有許多兼職的工作，讓我有固定的收入。我覺得這些收入已經足夠養活我和我的女兒了。
你剛剛提到你目前有好幾份兼職工作，因為它們本身都是兼職的性質，你能夠保守估計自己每個月會有多少的固定收入嗎？
You just mentioned that you have some part-time job. Because these jobs are not formal, do you have the whole overview of your regular income? Whether it is fixed?
I have, on average, four to five part-time jobs. As a total, they will bring me about NT$50,000 per month. Sometimes, if I have new projects, I may be able to have more income.
我平均有4到5個兼職工作。大約可以讓我賺5萬塊吧。如果我有其他案子的話，收入會更多。
另外我想要問的問題，是關於你有沒有可能在得到孩子撫養權後，把孩子帶回加拿大，就不回來了呢？我會這樣問，主要是因為，即使你拿到撫養權，你太太還是可能可以保有探視權，如果你把小孩子帶回你的國家，就會變成是變相的隔離她們母女見面。對這一點，你有什麼意見。

Besides, the court would like to ask another question. Do you plan to bring her back to Canada and do not return to Taiwan after you have the sole custody? The reason for asking this question is that your wife may still have the visitation right after you have the sole custody. If you bring your daughter back to your country, it may evolve into a situation that you cut the tie between your wife and your daughter. About this point, what do you want to say?

I have stayed in Taiwan for five years already. I have an ARC and I like this place. So far, I don’t have any plan to leave Taiwan. Especially, I believe that my daughter should have the opportunity to see both of her parents. I want to emphasize that although my wife and I are currently seeking a divorce, I have no intention of cutting the tie between her and my daughter. During the entire period of our divorce case, I have regularly sent our daughter’s pictures to my wife. I even arranged outings to encourage her to spend time with us, me and our daughter.
我在台灣已經待了5年了。我己經有了居留證號碼，也喜歡這個地方。我沒有任何離開台灣的打算。我認為，其實女兒有可以看我們雙親的權利。我想要強調一點，雖然我們現在打離婚官司，但我沒有要切斷他們兩個聯繫的意圖。在我們打離婚官司的時候，我還寄了不少我女兒的照片給老婆呢。我甚至安排時間能讓我和女兒、還有我的太太一起出遊呢。
所以你的意思是指，在近期之內你並沒有返回母國的打算，是這樣嗎？
You mean that recently, you don’t have the plan to return to your country.
No, I may go back to Canada because my mother is old and sick. However, even if I go back, I wouldn’t stay long. I won’t even consider the possibility of taking my daughter with me.
其實我也可能會回加拿大，因為我媽媽很老、很虛弱。如果我回國，也不會待太久，甚至不考慮把我女兒一起拜去加拿大。
那接下來我要請問相對人，請問你現在已經沒有跟先生同住了嗎？
Okay, now I’m going to ask the other party. Is that true that you don’t live with your husband?
對，我們已經分居六個月了。
Yes, we have been separated for about 6 months.
請問妳是什麼時候提出離婚訴訟的。
When did you file the case about your divorce?
我大概是兩個月前提的。
About 2 months ago.
也就是說，早在你提出離婚訴訟之前，你們就已經沒有住在一起了。
That is to say, before you file the divorce case, you two have not lived together. Is that true?
是的。
Yes.
那請問妳現在的居住狀況如何？我指的是，跟誰住？
So, how is your living situation? I mean that who accompanies you, live with you.
我帶著第一任婚姻的兒子一起住。
I live with my son with my first marriage.
第一任婚姻？那你跟告訴人的婚姻是第幾次？
Your first marriage? What is the time of marriage with the plaintiff?
他是我第二任先生。
He is my second husband.
所以現在爭的子女撫養權，是你跟第二任先生的小孩？是個女兒？
Therefore, you are seeking to the custody of your daughter, who you have with the second husband.
對。
Yes.
你的兒子幾歲了？女兒幾歲了？
How old is your son with your first marriage?
我兒子7歲了，我女兒8個月大。
My son is 7 years old, and my daughter is about 8 months.
那你搬出去住的時候，女兒是跟你、還是跟他？
After you move away from your house, you bring your daughter with you?
因為我搬出去的時候，女兒只有2個月大，還很需要我的照顧，所以孩子跟我。
Because at that time, my daughter was only 2 months, she still needed my support.
那現在孩子在誰那裏？
Now, where is your daughter?
現在女兒在我先生那裏。
My daughter is living with my husband.
你們中間有什麼協議嗎，為什麼原來女兒跟你，現在跟他。
Do you two have any agreements with each other because firstly, she lives with you, and now she lives with your husband?
我搬出來住的地方比較小，原來跟先生的房子比較大。環境上來說，對孩子比較優，所以我把孩子交給先生。
The house I’m living after moving out is smaller than the one that I stayed with my husband. In terms of the environment, I think it is better to stay in the original house with my husband.
那如果客觀條件沒有改變的話，你的居住環境，對你女兒仍然比較不好，不是嗎？那為什麼會希望能夠爭取子女撫養權呢
If the objective circumstance about your house is not better than your husband’s house, it is not good for your daughter, isn’t it? Why do you want to have the right to rear your daughter?
她是我懷胎十個月生下來的阿，我怎麼捨得以後都看不到她呢？而且我先生是加拿大籍，他在台灣的工作也沒有很穩定，隨時有可能會回去加拿大，那這樣子的話，我不就見不到女兒了嗎？所以我希望能夠爭取女兒的撫養權。

I had been pregnant about 10 months for the daughter. How can I just give my daughter to my husband? Furthermore, my husband is a Canadian. He don’t have regular jobs and formal jobs, I’m afraid that he will go back to Canada. If that is true, I will not see my daughter anymore. Therefore, I would like to strike to have the right to rear my daughter.
就妳的經濟能力而言，你可以加以說明如何負擔女兒的撫養費用嗎？
For your financial status, please elaborate how you will take care of your daughter in the future.
我們目前還在打離婚官司，我希望能夠爭取到離婚之後能住在我先生現居的那棟房子裡，所以就環境來講，那棟房子會很適合我女兒成長。至於我個人的經濟能力，我有提供給法院一份目前我的財產表，除此之外，我也有固定的工作，一個月收入至少是4萬以上。我想我有能力撫養、照顧我的女兒。

We are still dealing with the case of our divorce. Now, I’m seeking to win, to have the right to live in the original house, which now my husband is living. Therefore, in terms of the living conditions and environment, the original house is better for my daughter to grow up. As to my financial status, I have provided a asset list for my income. Besides, I have a formal job in Taiwan, and the regular payment is 40,000 NT dollars. I think that I have the capacity to take care of my daughter.
請問你們目前的離婚案件進行地如何？有預定什麼時候判決會出來嗎？或是說，大概什麼時候判決會出來？
How is your divorce case now? Do you have the idea about the exact time to close your divorce case?
我不太確定，我們這個禮拜五還會再出庭一次，可是我希望能夠向離婚案件的法官表達，希望判決能夠盡快出來。
I’m not sure. This Friday, we will attend the court about my marriage. I hope that I will ask the court to have their decision faster and earlier.
這樣好了，本院會安排社工人員造訪告訴人跟相對人雙方，並且針對你們與孩子的相處情況做出評估，本庭會參考他們的報告，來決定怎麼樣的安排對孩子是最好的。不過在那之前，想先請問一下，你們雙方會考慮共同持有撫養權嗎？所謂的共同撫養，是指孩子一段時間跟父親、另外一段時間跟母親。

Okay, the court will arrange social workers to visit you two, and these social workers will evaluate in terms of the circumstances about rearing your daughter. We will make further decision in terms of their observation. However, before that, can have shared custody? Shared custody is that your daughter will stay with your husband a whole and later will spend some time with the mother.

Personally, I do not favor this arrangement because my daughter is still too small. She is only 8 months old. I don’t want her to go through the changes between me and my wife. For a child at such a young age, it is too confusing for her if she has to stay with one parent for some time and another for another period of time.
我個人認為，我不太想要共同扶養權，我女兒還很小，只有8個月大，我不希望她在我跟太太之間送來送去的。對一個只有8個月的小孩來說，一下子跟我住，一下子又跟她媽媽住的話，會讓她十分困擾。
在這點上面，我同意我先生的看法。女兒還太小，不應該、也不適合共同撫養的安排方式。
About this point, I agree with my husband. Our daughter is still too young. It is not appropriate for her to live with the shared custody.
既然如此，那麼我們就先進行社工探視的安排。等到他們做出報告，我們再安排庭期，讓雙方有陳述意見的機會。這樣可以嗎？

Therefore, the court will first arrange social workers to visit with you two parties. After their report and observation, we will further set a court day. Therefore, on that day, you can elaborate further about this case.
Yes, I am fine with social workers’ visits.
好的，我可以接受社工人員的拜訪。
沒有問題，謝謝。
Yes, I’m okay as well for this arranging.

I have stayed in Taiwan for five years already. I have an ARC and I like this place. So far, I don’t have any plan to leave Taiwan. Especially, I believe that my daughter should have the opportunity to see both of her parents. I want to emphasize that although my wife and I are currently seeking a divorce, I have no intention of cutting the tie between her and my daughter. 所以你的意思是指，在近期之內你並沒有返回母國的打算，是這樣嗎？
So, you mean that in a short time, you are not intended to go back to your homeland, right?
No, I may go back to Canada because my mother is old and sick. However, even if I go back, I wouldn’t stay long. I won’t even consider the possibility of taking my daughter with me.
是的，目前沒有這個計畫，但如果有一天我媽媽老了又生病的話。即使我回去，應該也不會待很久。我甚至也不會考慮帶我女兒一起回去。
那接下來我要請問相對人，請問你現在已經沒有跟先生同住了嗎？
Now, the court would like to ask the defendant some questions. Are you no longer staying with your husband.
對，我們已經分居六個月了。
Yes, we have been no longer living together for six months.
請問妳是什麼時候提出離婚訴訟的。
When did you file the divorce case?
我大概是兩個月前提的。
I filed the case around two months ago.
也就是說，早在你提出離婚訴訟之前，你們就已經沒有住在一起了。
So, before you filed the divorce, you hadn’t lived with your husband for a long time.
是的。
Yes.
那請問妳現在的居住狀況如何？我指的是，跟誰住？
What is your current living circumstances? I mean who are you living with now
我帶著第一任婚姻的兒子一起住。
Now, I am living with my son of my ex-husband?
第一任婚姻？那你跟告訴人的婚姻是第幾次？
First marriage? So which marriage is it with the plaintiff.
他是我第二任先生。
He is my second husband.
所以現在爭的子女撫養權，是你跟第二任先生的小孩？是個女兒？
Now, the child custody we are here for is between the second husband, for the daughter?
對。
Yes.
你的兒子幾歲了？女兒幾歲了？
And how old is your son, and how old is your daughter?
我兒子7歲了，我女兒8個月大。
My son is seven years old, and my daughter is eight-month old.
那你搬出去住的時候，女兒是跟你、還是跟他？
When you moved out, was your daughter left by your husband or you brought her with you?
因為我搬出去的時候，女兒只有2個月大，還很需要我的照顧，所以孩子跟我。
When I moved out, my daughter was only two-month old; therefore, I brought her with me.
那現在孩子在誰那裏？
And where is the child now?
現在女兒在我先生那裏。
Now, my daughter is living with my husband.
你們中間有什麼協議嗎，為什麼原來女兒跟你，現在跟他。
Is there an agreement between you? Why you brought your daughter with you, and she is now with your husband?
我搬出來住的地方比較小，原來跟先生的房子比較大。環境上來說，對孩子比較優，所以我把孩子交給先生。
After I moved out, I found an apartment which is smaller than the place my husband is living. Taking living circumstances into consideration, my husband’s place is better than mine.
那如果客觀條件沒有改變的話，你的居住環境，對你女兒仍然比較不好，不是嗎？那為什麼會希望能夠爭取子女撫養權呢

她是我懷胎十個月生下來的阿，我怎麼捨得以後都看不到她呢？而且我先生是加拿大籍，他在台灣的工作也沒有很穩定，隨時有可能會回去加拿大，那這樣子的話，我不就見不到女兒了嗎？所以我希望能夠爭取女兒的撫養權。

I gave birth to my daughter, so how could I be separated from her? And my husband is a Canadian, and he does not have a stable job here. He may go back to Canada at any time. If that is the case, I will never my daughter again. Therefore, I hope to be granted with my daughter’s custody.
就妳的經濟能力而言，你可以加以說明如何負擔女兒的撫養費用嗎？
As to your financial status, how could you afford your daughter’s spending?
我們目前還在打離婚官司，我希望能夠爭取到離婚之後能住在我先生現居的那棟房子裡，所以就環境來講，那棟房子會很適合我女兒成長。至於我個人的經濟能力，我有提供給法院一份目前我的財產表，除此之外，我也有固定的工作，一個月收入至少是4萬以上。我想我有能力撫養、照顧我的女兒。

Now, we are still engaged in a divorce case. So, I would like to ask to live in the apartment my husband lives now after our divorce. Based on the living environment, the apartment will be suitable for my daughter to grow up. As to my financial status, I have provided my asset list to the court. Besides, I have stable job, my regular income is at least 40000 NT dollars per month. So, I think I have the ability to rear my daughter.
請問你們目前的離婚案件進行地如何？有預定什麼時候判決會出來嗎？或是說，大概什麼時候判決會出來？
And how is your divorce case going? Do you know the estimated date that the court’s decision comes out?
我不太確定，我們這個禮拜五還會再出庭一次，可是我希望能夠向離婚案件的法官表達，希望判決能夠盡快出來。

這樣好了，本院會安排社工人員造訪告訴人跟相對人雙方，並且針對你們與孩子的相處情況做出評估，本庭會參考他們的報告，來決定怎麼樣的安排對孩子是最好的。不過在那之前，想先請問一下，你們雙方會考慮共同持有撫養權嗎？所謂的共同撫養，是指孩子一段時間跟父親、另外一段時間跟母親。

So, the court will arrange some social workers to visit both of your places, the plaintiff and the defendant. And evaluate your relations with your daughter from your both sides. 我個人不太考慮這一點，因為我女兒還太小。他只有八個月大而已。我不想要他跟經歷我和太太的離異過程。對一個那麼小的小孩來講，可能會造成他認知上的混淆，如果他必須跟他的父親住一段時間，又再去跟母親住一段時間的話。

As to this point, I agree with my husband. My daughter is too young to arrange this way at such a young age.

Yes, I am fine with social workers’ visits.
是的，我接受社工來訪。
沒有問題，謝謝。
I have no problems, too. Thank you.

我是這麼以為的。在我到台灣交付這個高爾夫球袋之後，就可以回到泰國，然後領取那1000塊美金。

So when you accepted this offer, you knew what you were bringing was heroine?

不不不不，我完全沒有想到球桿裡面會藏有海洛因。
你不覺得，如果只是請你帶黃金入台灣，這個代價，也就是1000美金，有點高嗎？
Don’t you think that to bring gold into Taiwan, 1000 dollars, this is a bit high?
I don't know if that's too much, I just want to make a little extra money.
我不知道這樣的價格是不是太高，我只是想要賺更多錢。
你有沒有想過，為什麼那個人不要自己帶來呢？
Haven’t you ever questioned why he didn’t bring it himself?
Kent told me he was busy and wanted someone to help him.
Kent和我說他太忙了，而需要人來幫助他。

Even if in the golf bag, it was gold, you should know that bringing gold into the country could be against the law, isn’t that right?
I only know that gold is cheaper in Thailand, I don't know if it is illegal to bring gold into Taiwan.
我知道在泰國黃金的價錢會更便宜，但我不知道帶到台灣這是違法..或是不違法。
你為什麼會覺得，帶黃金不會有問題呢？
Why did you think that bringing gold would be okay
Gold is gold, no big deal, no?
黃金就只是黃金吧，他並不會造成什麼大問題的啊
你在拿袋子的時候，有檢查過裡面的貨品嗎？
When you were carrying the golf bag, did you check what it held inside?
No, I didn't because that bag was sealed. I don't think I can open a bag.
我沒有，因為袋子被封起來了。我不覺得我可以打開它。
你就這麼信任對方，不覺得有可能受騙嗎？

你的意思是說，對方有表達想要跟你一起合作生意，所以你才不疑有他嗎？

Yeah, so that's why I trust him so much.
對，我以為我們會一起工作。這也是為什麼我會這麼信任他。

我對此感到很抱歉，我不知道袋子裡面裝了什麼東西。我以為裡面是黃金，要是有人和我說裡面是海洛因的話，我絕對不會答應要帶到台灣的。請原諒我。
除了Kent之外，你有比較具體、可幫助警方查到委託你的人是誰的細節嗎？
Besides Kent, do you have any more concrete information to help the police to find who the person who… asked to bring the bag is?
All I have is the cell phone Kent gave me.
我就只有他給我的那隻手機。

如卷所示。
As the record says.
