However, Portuguese is not really popular in Taiwan, so my husband’s working situation is not really stable. Further, sometimes he would have a period between jobs (which) lasts for month. Then, he wants to have a stable income. He started to teach English. However, his mother tongue is not English, so he wants to pursue advanced study
你剛剛講到他決定要進修，是在台灣念一個學位嗎？
You just said that that he wants to pursue advanced study, so does he want to get another degree in Taiwan?
不是，因為他希望能夠在台灣教英文，所以必須取得的學位是關於英語教學的。他在網路上找到了一個美國加州所提供的遠距教學課程，讓他可以不用人去美國，都可以用函授的方式，完成課程的要求，這樣子在完成所有的學分之後，就可以取得碩士學位。他的計畫是，透過這樣子的一個美國學位，能夠在台灣找到英文教師的工作。

No. he wants to teach English in Taiwan, so he needs to get a degree for English teaching. He found a distance program online from California. Consequently he doesn’t have to go to the United States. He can complete the program at home. After he finish(es) all the courses, he can get the degree. If he receives the degree from California, the US, then he would find a job of English teaching in Taiwan
那他跟這次所謂的外遇對象，是什麼樣的關係呢？
What’s his relationship with his colleague
他們是補習班的同事。那個補習班有安排所謂的中師跟外師搭檔教學。那個女的就是他班上的中師。
They are colleagues in the cram school. At that cram school, they assign a foreign teacher to match with another local teacher and that person is his partner.
你怎麼會知道他們有外遇呢？
How do you know they two have intimate relationship?
一開始我只是注意到我先生常常會留在學校加班，我問過他好幾次，只不過是個美語補習班，有什麼好加班的？他告訴我說，因為要和中師搭檔教學，有很多需要溝通的地方。一開始我真的沒有懷疑他，可是我後來發現，他常常會在回家之後，接到一些電話，而接到電話的時候，都不會在我面前講，還會特地到書房去講。這讓我開始有所懷疑。所以我就查看了他的手機。

At first, I just noticed that my husband usually worked really late at cram school. I’ve asked him for many times. “It’s only a small cram school. Why would you need to work so late?” he told me that because we need to teach with another teacher at the same time, so we need to cooperate and need to discuss something. I didn’t doubt him at first. Later, he would receive some calls even when he arrived home. Further, he would answer the call not in front of me and he would go(es) back to his room to answer the call. This aroused my curiosity, so I checked his cellphone
在手機中你看到什麼不尋常的嗎？
Do you see any abnormal message in his cellphone?
他的通訊紀錄中常常看到同一個電話號碼，所以我很好奇的又去查他的簡訊，查了之後才發現他跟一個女的幾乎每天都通簡訊。
I saw the same number calls him or he calls that number in his cellphone. So I checked his text messages. After that, I found out that, he sent messages with a woman almost every day.
就算是發簡訊，也還好吧？難道內容很不宜嗎？
I think frequently texting with another person is quite normal. Is the message content abnormal ?
如果只是普通的簡訊也就罷了，可是他是一個已婚的人，怎麼會讓對方發一些很親密的字句呢? 之前我有提供一些他們的簡訊內容給法院，應該都在卷夾裡面了。

If the content is normal, I would not doubt him. However, he’s already married, how could he make others send him some intimate messages? I provided the contents of the text messages. I think all of them is (are) in the documents.
提示偵卷(一)第13頁。這邊裡面有幾通簡訊內容，請被告看一下。請問這是你手機上的簡訊內容嗎？
Please see the Document One, page13. Defendant, here are some pieces of your text massages. Please check it. Are they the same (as) the ones in your cellphone?
Yes, this is a message on my cell phone.
是的，它們和我手機裡的一樣。
那我現在要針對這幾個內容跟你問一下，第一封是在中華民國101年11月31日21點50分，由手機0958-932***發送到你手機上的簡訊，內容是「I really miss you, my love」，請問這是什麼意思？

Then I would like to ask you some questions according to these messages. The first one is sent from the number 0958932*** at nine fifty p.m. on November 31st 2012. The content is I really miss you…(what do you mean by this sentence?)

Well, it’s from a colleague of mine. I remember, at that time, I took two days off from work. She was a bit concerned or worried. That’s why she sent me that message. My colleague was educated in the US and she is very open-minded. That’s the way she talked and expressed herself. As to “my love,” that is just a way we call the people we care.
我記得我那時候休假了兩天。她有點擔心我。所以她才會發這則簡訊。我的同事是在美國受教育的所以她待人比較隨和， 所以她講話比較直接就像簡訊上那樣。「親愛的」只是我們稱呼自己在乎的人的方法。
你是說，這個發信人因為之前在國外待過所以思想比較西化，對情感的表達也比較開放一點，所以「我的愛」並沒有什麼特別的意思，是嗎？

Do you mean that the person who sent you this message was educated in America, so she’s quite open-minded and westernized? Then she’s quite open to express her emotions and affections. Therefore, “my love” means nothing. Do you mean that?
No, that is a very common expression between good friends or friends who care a lot for each other.
對阿，這就只是認識很久朋友互相的稱呼或是互相關心的人會這樣稱呼。
那她前面那句呢？
How about another sentence?
As I said, she was worried about me. We are partners at work. When I was away for two days, she naturally missed me.
我說過了，她很擔心我。但我們就只是同事的關係。當我有兩天沒去上班的時候，她當然會想到我。
你的意思是，對方只是因為你兩天沒有上班，才發這樣的簡訊，因為沒有你上課的輔助，所以她很想你？就只是這樣子嗎？
Did you mean that she sent you this message just because you were two day off from work? Without your assistance and cooperation, so she missed you? Is that this simple?
Yes, that was the context. The message was no big deal
對阿就只是這樣而已，並沒有甚麼大不了的。
那第二封簡訊，是在中華民國102年1月13日23點55分，也是由同一個人的手機發送給你，訊息內容是「I want you by my side, when can we be truly together?」，請問這句話是什麼意思，為什麼會有這樣的內容呢？
Then, please check the second message. It’s from the same number at 11:55 p.m. on January 13th 2013. The content is something intimate, what does that mean? What does that mean by these lines?
She wrote me that message to tell me how to express a Chinese sentence in my assignment.
她寫這樣的訊息給我只是想要教我中文。
你是說對方會發這個簡訊給你，是為了幫助你做作業嗎？這是什麼意思？
You mean that she sent you this kind of messages to help you with your Chinese assignment?

As my wife has informed the court. I was attending a Master’s program. In that program, I was required to complete 30 credits before I could receive my degree. Naturally, I needed to complete some assignments and exercises.
就像我太太先前說的，我正在唸一個學位。要完成學位我要在畢業前修完30個學分，那當然我需要做一些作業來拿到學分阿。
先請你解釋一下，你的碩士學位到底在念什麼？
Can you explain further for your master degree? What do you study for?
My program was TESOL. In that program, some of the courses were related to English teaching and others were related to culture and language competence.
我的學位是有關英語教學的。要完成這個學位，裡面有些關於教學的課程也有些關於中英語文能力的訓練。
所以你拿的是英語教學碩士，可是裡面有一些文化溝通的課程是嗎？
So you pursue for the English teaching mater degree; however there are still some further culture courses in that degree?
Yes, I remember at least three courses were related to culture and communication.
是的，至少有三門課是跟文化和溝通相關的。
那這種所謂的文化溝通課程，都給什麼樣的作業呢？
You used the tem culture, so what would the teacher give you as assignments in the course?

The assignments for the culture and communication courses can be different for every student. Take myself for example. I am in Taiwan and try to seek a teaching position as an English teacher. To reach this goal and prove my competence, I have to show that I have a good command of Chinese. Therefore, many of my assignments were about Chinese-English sentence translation.
這門課的功課可能會因學生而異。像我自己的話，我來台灣然後想要找一個英語教學的教師職位，為了要達成這個目標然後顯現這個能力，所以我必須要有足夠的中文能力。因此我很多作業都是關於中英句子的翻譯。
你是說因為你計畫在台灣教英文，所以這個碩士課程的內容就要求你證明自己有一定的中文能力。所以你必須完成課程中所給的一些作業，作業的練習就是翻譯句子，是這樣的嗎？

You mean that your goal is to teach English in Taiwan, so the course would ask you to proof your Chinese competence? Therefore, you had to complete some assignments and these assignments are about English and Chinese translation?
True. Of course, I was also required to sharpen my speaking and writing skills.
當然阿，而且我還需要磨練我的口說和寫作技巧
好，那再回到我們剛剛那句話。你說這是你的作業嗎？
Okay, so you said that this message content was your assignment right?

Yes, I remember that sentence. When I got the Chinese sentences, I didn’t know how to say them in English. You know, some Chinese words can be very difficult for foreigners to recognize. I needed some help so I asked my colleague to help me. I told her to translate that sentence for me and sent me the answer.
對阿，我還記得那個句子是甚麼。當我看到一個中文句子的時候我可能會不知道如何用英文來表達。你也知道吧，中文字有些時候對於外國人來說很難辨認阿，所以我需要別人的幫助，所以我就問我同事，我請她幫我翻譯然後請她把答案以簡訊寫給我。
你的意思就是說，因為你問了你同事那一句中文，她就把答案打成英文發簡訊給你，這就是當時的情況嗎？也就是說，這封簡訊只是作業的解答嗎？
You mean that you ask your colleague this sentence in Chinese and she sent it back in English? Is this the situation? You mean that this message was just all about assignment?
That message was only the answer to my homework.
那則簡訊真的就只是作業答案而已啦。
那再提示偵卷(一)第14到16業的所有簡訊內容，這些請你看一下，都是你因為要做作業，尋求對方幫助，對方才發給你的簡訊嗎？
Then, how about the contents in Document One from page 14 to 16? Please check these messages. Are they all for your assignments? Just because you want your colleague to answer you in English?
Yes, all these messages were for the same purpose of completing my assignments.
對，它們的目的都相同，就只是要幫我完成作業而已。
那針對你太太說，你跟你的同事王彩燕有外遇一事，你有何解釋？
Then how about the adultery between you and 王彩燕 from you wife?

My wife really thinks too much of this matter. I know she is not satisfied with my ability of supporting the family. I want the court to know that she, from the very beginning of my study, has never shown any support. She was not willing to help me complete my degree. If she had been a bit more supportive, I would not have asked my colleague to help me. I think she should be blamed for all this misunderstanding.
對於這件事我太太真的是想太多了。我知道她對於我可以照顧家庭的能力不滿意。我想讓您知道的是，從我開始念學位開始，她都很不支持，她甚至一點都不想要幫助我完成學位。如果她多幫我一點忙的話，我也不用問我同事啦，我想她應該要為這樣的誤解負責。
根據你的說法，你們夫妻之間似乎有些相處不愉快的情況？
According to your statement, you two don’t get along quite well?

At the beginning of our marriage, we did have some good time. But the problem is my employment. I tried teaching Portuguese in Taiwan but could not get stable teaching hours. Then my job became the issue between the two of us. We fought from time to time over this issue. She didn’t believe that I have tried my best, and I have no way to let her understand my frustration and the difficult situation I have faced.
在婚姻初期我們是相處得滿愉快的。但她一直對我的工作有微詞。我也嘗試要教葡萄牙語來維生，但工作不穩定。所以我們有時候會為了這件事有口角，我們常為了這件事情不合，她都不相信我有努力找工作，我也很難讓她理解我有多沮喪和挫折。
好，那回到你剛剛所講的碩士課程。請問你碩士課程是什麼時候開始的，結束了嗎？你拿到學位了嗎？
Let’s go back to the mater degree you mentioned. When did you start your master degree? When did you end it? Did you receive the degree?

I first started the program in Spring 2010. It was a two-year program. I should have finished the program in December 2012. I didn’t finish the program because I was working part-time and didn’t get enough time to do my course assignments. Like I said, my wife has never been very supportive. I felt that I was pursuing the degree all alone by myself. I became too tired and too frustrated.
我是在2010的春季開始上課。它是一個兩年的課程，我應該要在2012的12月完成這個學業，但是我並沒如期完成，因為我有一些兼職，還要寫作業，這樣有點困難。就想我先前說的，我太太不太支持我，所以我會覺得我自己在念書的時候好像只有一個人在奮鬥，所以我相當疲憊跟挫折。
你是說這個課程原來是兩年期的，可是你最後沒有完成。為什麼呢？
You mean that it’s two-year-long program and you didn’t finish it, why?
I couldn’t finish all the course requirement.
我無法達成每堂課的要求。
那你註冊在學的最後一個學期，是什麼時候結束的呢?
When was(did) the last semester you registered end?
The last semester of my registration was fall 2012.
我註冊的最後一個學期是2012年的秋季班。
如果誠如你所述，你最後一個學期的結束日期是中華民國101年12月5日，那麼合理推斷在那個學期之後，你就不會有任何作業了吧?但是你與同事之間的簡訊聯絡卻一直到課程結束六個月都還在進行。這是為什麼呢？

If what you said I is true, and the last semester of your registration ended on December 5th 2012; then after that you would not have to contact your colleague for the assignment right? However, you two, you and your colleague, had been contacting with each other for over six months after that.

Well, I might not have finished that program but it doesn’t mean I didn’t want to improve my language ability. Even when I failed the program, I still wanted to improve my Chinese ability, so I continued to study on my own.
我可能真的無法完成學業，但並不代表我不想學習阿。雖然我無法完成學業，但我想持續精進中文，所以才會繼續和她聯絡。
你的意思是，儘管你沒有完成那個碩士課程，你還是想要不斷的學中文，讓你的中文更加流利，是嗎？
You mean that even that you didn’t complete your degree, you still want to sharpen your Chinese by your own?
Yes, that’s why I asked my colleague for help.
是的，這就是我繼續和我同事尋求協助的原因。
那你的這位同事，她所扮演的角色就像你的家教囉？
Your colleague is just like your tutor right?
She has been not only a tutor but also a true friend.
她不只是家教的角色她還是我真心的朋友。
你有付錢給她嗎？
Did you pay her?
No, I offered to pay her but she declined.
沒有，我曾經有提過，但她拒絕了。
如果你沒有付錢給她，她為什麼要在半夜應該就寢的時候還不辭辛勞的發簡訊回答你的問題呢？這是不是已經超過了一個同事應該做的事情？
If you didn’t pay her, why would she like to teach you Chinese so late at night, even it’s time for bed? Is it beyond the normal relationships between colleagues?
That’s why I said she was a very supportive friend. She was using her own time to help me learn Chinese.
我說過啦，她是一個很好的朋友，很支持我。她用她自己私人的時間來教我中文。
你現在還有在那家補習班教英文嗎？
Do you still teach at that cram school?
Yes, I am still working there.
是的，我還在那裏工作。
那這位同事王彩燕也還在那裏服務嗎？
Does 王彩燕 also work there till now?
She is also still working there but we don’t team up any more.
她也還在那裏工作，但我們沒有再搭檔合作了。
請問檢察官，有沒有進一步要傳喚的證人或是調查事證？
Is there any person you want to subpoena or is there any evidence you want to investigate more?
希望能夠傳訊被告的同事，也就是任職伯元補習班的王彩燕以證人身分到庭，說明他與被告之間的關係，以及那些簡訊的撰寫背景及目的。
I would like to subpoena 王彩燕 as a witness from 伯元cram school. I want her to describe their relationships and why she wrote that kind of messages.
請問告訴人有沒有任何希望本庭代為調查的事證？
Plaintiff, is there any evidence that you want the court to investigate for you?
我聽說該補習班針對他們兩個人的關係，有採取一些行動。其中更有試圖說服該女王彩燕離職一事，不知道能不能向那個補習班求證這件事情。
I heard that cram school has taken some actions for their relationships. Further, the cram school had tried to make 王彩燕 off. I don’t know if there is any possibility to proof this.
那請問被告，有沒有任何希望法庭為你調查的事證？現在的情況是，你的碩士學位早就已經在中華民國101年12月05日結束，實在沒有理由以做作業為藉口來解釋你跟王彩燕的簡訊互動，尤其是你們的簡訊互動大多在晚上九點鐘以後進行，實在起人疑竇，你有沒有任何證據，可以幫助自己的案情呢？

Defendant, is there any evidence that you want the court to investigate for you? Now the situation is that your program should end on December 5th 2012, and you should not use completing assignments as an excuse to contact 王彩燕. The text messages between you two almost happened after 9 p.m. It’s really easily to rouse people’s curiosity. Do you have any evidence that can help you with your case?

I cannot think of any evidence that the court can investigate on my behalf. As I said, the reason for the communication between my colleague and me was very simple. I only wanted to improve my language ability and continue to learn Chinese.
我實在想不到有甚麼其他的證據了，誠如我之前所說的，我和我同事之間的簡訊互動真的很普通，我真的只是想要增進中文能力然後繼續學中文。
那本庭訂中華民國103年06月09日下午4點30分進行證人詰問程序，請告訴人、被告都要到庭，如果有必要，雙方都可以請辯護人，明白嗎？
Then we set next court at 4:30 p.m. on June 9th 2014 for the witness procedure. Please both of you show up at that time. If it’s necessary, you two have the right to lawyer.
我明白。
I understand.
I understand.
我明白。
今天庭期到此結束。
Today’s court is adjourned.

今天我們進行外遇案件之準備程序。告訴人陳玉華提起這次的訴訟案件，主要是因為她的先生John Anderston跟所任職之補習班同事從往過密，且告訴人在其先生的手機簡訊記錄中查到一些親密訊息，再加上被告常常會藉故加班，或是深夜與其同事王彩燕進行視訊或其他方式之交談，因告訴人所蒐集之通訊內容已超過同事情誼，故提起此告訴。被告，你太太懷疑你有外遇，要告你通姦罪，你作何辯解？

你是說對方會發這個簡訊給你，是為了幫助你做作業嗎？這是什麼意思？
You mean she sent you this text message to help you with your homework? What do you mean by that?

As my wife has informed the court. I was attending a Master’s program. In that program, I was required to complete 30 credits before I could receive my degree. Naturally, I needed to complete some assignments and exercises.
就像我妻子在法庭中提到的，我當時在修一堂課。那堂課需要修滿30個學分我才能取得學位，所以我當然需要完成一些作業和練習。
先請你解釋一下，你的碩士學位到底在念什麼？
Can you please elaborate on what you really are learning for your masters?
My program was TESOL. In that program, some of the courses were related to English teaching and others were related to culture and language competence.
我修的是英語教育的課程。期中，有些課程是漢英語教學相關。有的是漢西方文化或語言能力有關。
所以你拿的是英語教學碩士，可是裡面有一些文化溝通的課程是嗎？
So your seeking a TESOL masters degree, some courses are related to culture?
Yes, I remember at least three courses were related to culture and communication.
是的，我記得至少有三堂課與文化和傳播有關係。
那這種所謂的文化溝通課程，都給什麼樣的作業呢？
Then, what kind of an assignment would you have to finish for the courses in culture and communication?

The assignments for the culture and communication courses can be different for every student. Take myself for example. I am in Taiwan and try to seek a teaching position as an English teacher. To reach this goal and prove my competence, I have to show that I have a good command of Chinese. Therefore, many of my assignments were about Chinese-English sentence translation.
每個學生會收到的作業可能都不同。舉我自己的例子來說吧，我人在台灣，然後想要找一份英語教學的工作。為了達成這個目標，然後展現我的能力，我必須表現出我對中文的瞭解。所以我的作業很多都是和中英翻譯有關係。
你是說因為你計畫在台灣教英文，所以這個碩士課程的內容就要求你證明自己有一定的中文能力。所以你必須完成課程中所給的一些作業，作業的練習就是翻譯句子，是這樣的嗎？

What you mean is that because you are seeking a job to teach English in Taiwan, the homework requires you to have Chinese competence as well? So you have to finish certain assignments in your course, and they are often related to Chinese-English translation.
True. Of course, I was also required to sharpen my speaking and writing skills.
是的，當然我還被要求要有口說還有寫作能力。
好，那再回到我們剛剛那句話。你說這是你的作業嗎？
OK, let’s go back to what we mentioned before, you said this was your assignment, right?

Yes, I remember that sentence. When I got the Chinese sentences, I didn’t know how to say them in English. You know, some Chinese words can be very difficult for foreigners to recognize. I needed some help so I asked my colleague to help me. I told her to translate that sentence for me and sent me the answer.
對，我記得那句話。當我拿到中文句子時，我不知道英文剛怎麼說。你知道的，有很多中文的句子對外國人來說很難理解。我需要一些幫助，所以我同事來幫我。我請她幫我翻譯那個句子，再把答案寄給我。
你的意思就是說，因為你問了你同事那一句中文，她就把答案打成英文發簡訊給你，這就是當時的情況嗎？也就是說，這封簡訊只是作業的解答嗎？
So the situation was… you gave the Chinese sentence to your colleague and she sent back the English translation of it? So this text message was only an answer for an assignment?
That message was only the answer to my homework.
那封簡訊就只是作業的答案而已。
那再提示偵卷(一)第14到16業的所有簡訊內容，這些請你看一下，都是你因為要做作業，尋求對方幫助，對方才發給你的簡訊嗎？
OK, then, let’s take a look at Evidence number 1, page 14 to 16. Please take a look at the content. Are the reason behind sending all these text messages, your homework assignment?
Yes, all these messages were for the same purpose of completing my assignments.
是的，所有的簡訊都是要幫助我回答我作業的問題。
那針對你太太說，你跟你的同事王彩燕有外遇一事，你有何解釋？
Then may I ask you, may you explain that your wife is accusing you of having an affair with your colleague Tsai-Yen Wang?

My wife really thinks too much of this matter. I know she is not satisfied with my ability of supporting the family. I want the court to know that she, from the very beginning of my study, has never shown any support. She was not willing to help me complete my degree. If she had been a bit more supportive, I would not have asked my colleague to help me. I think she should be blamed for all this misunderstanding.
我太太真的想太多了。我知道她對我很不滿意，就在于沒辦法照顧好家庭上。法官我希望你知道，從我開始攻讀碩士到現在她一直沒有支持我。她一點也不想幫助我完成學業。她要是更支持我一點，我才不需要請我同事來幫我。我想這所有的誤解應該怪在她身上才對。
根據你的說法，你們夫妻之間似乎有些相處不愉快的情況？
According to your statement, there seems to be an unhappy relationship between the two parties.

At the beginning of our marriage, we did have some good time. But the problem is my employment. I tried teaching Portuguese in Taiwan but could not get stable teaching hours. Then my job became the issue between the two of us. We fought from time to time over this issue. She didn’t believe that I have tried my best, and I have no way to let her understand my frustration and the difficult situation I have faced.
在我們剛結婚的時候，我們的確度過了一些美好的時光。但是我的失業就是一個很大的問題。我嘗試要找到教葡萄牙文的工作，但沒辦法取得很穩定的工作時數，所有工作問題就成為我們兩個人之間的阻礙。我們時常為了這件事情吵架。她不認為我已經盡力了。我也真的沒辦法認清我的狀況與我面臨的問題。
好，那回到你剛剛所講的碩士課程。請問你碩士課程是什麼時候開始的，結束了嗎？你拿到學位了嗎？
Ok, then, let’s return to the Masters degree you mentioned. When did your courses begin? Did you finish all your courses? Did you obtain your degree?

I first started the program in Spring 2010. It was a two-year program. I should have finished the program in December 2012. I didn’t finish the program because I was working part-time and didn’t get enough time to do my course assignments. Like I said, my wife has never been very supportive. I felt that I was pursuing the degree all alone by myself. I became too tired and too frustrated.
我在2010年的春天開始上課。它是一個兩年的課程。我本來能在2012年十二月完成學位的。但我最後沒有取得學位，因為當時有堅持的工作然後不夠時間去完成作業。就像我先前提到的，我老婆並不太支持我。我覺得我是孤單一個人地在爭取這個學位。我開始感到累，然後煩惱。
你是說這個課程原來是兩年期的，可是你最後沒有完成。為什麼呢？
So you mean this…degree requires two years, two terms. But you didn’t finish your degree, why?
I couldn’t finish all the course requirement.
我沒辦法去達到所有的課程的要求。
那你註冊在學的最後一個學期，是什麼時候結束的呢?
And when did your last term that you were registered in school end?
The last semester of my registration was fall 2012.
我註冊的最後一學期是2012年的秋天。
如果誠如你所述，你最後一個學期的結束日期是中華民國101年12月5日，那麼合理推斷在那個學期之後，你就不會有任何作業了吧?但是你與同事之間的簡訊聯絡卻一直到課程結束六個月都還在進行。這是為什麼呢？

If what you say is true, then your final term ends at September 12th 2012. And by then all your homework assignments have ended. But you continued to sent text message after the end of your course for over 6 months, how do you explain this?

Well, I might not have finished that program but it doesn’t mean I didn’t want to improve my language ability. Even when I failed the program, I still wanted to improve my Chinese ability, so I continued to study on my own.
我雖然沒有拿到學位、沒有完成這些課程，但這並不代表我不想繼續讓我英文進步啊！雖然我沒有完成我的課程，但我想不斷讓我的語言能力進步，所以我繼續努力。
你的意思是，儘管你沒有完成那個碩士課程，你還是想要不斷的學中文，讓你的中文更加流利，是嗎？
So what you mean is that although you didn’t finish your masters courses, you wanted to improve your Mandarin on your own, is that right?
Yes, that’s why I asked my colleague for help.
對，這就是為什麼我找我同事幫我。
那你的這位同事，她所扮演的角色就像你的家教囉？
Then the role your colleague takes is kind of like your tutor, is that right?
She has been not only a tutor but also a true friend.
她不單只是我的家教，也是我真心的好朋友。
你有付錢給她嗎？
Did you pay her?
No, I offered to pay her but she declined.
沒有，我有主動提出要給她錢，但她拒絕我了。
如果你沒有付錢給她，她為什麼要在半夜應該就寢的時候還不辭辛勞的發簡訊回答你的問題呢？這是不是已經超過了一個同事應該做的事情？
If you didn’t pay her, then why did she reply your text messages late at night when she supposedly should be asleep? Doesn’t this exceed what colleagues do to help each other?
That’s why I said she was a very supportive friend. She was using her own time to help me learn Chinese.
所以我才說她是一個很支持人的朋友。她犧牲她自己的時間來幫我學中文。
你現在還有在那家補習班教英文嗎？
Are you still teaching English at that cram school?
Yes, I am still working there.
是，我還在那邊工作。
那這位同事王彩燕也還在那裏服務嗎？
Is your coworker Tsai-Yen Wang still working there?
She is also still working there but we don’t team up any more.
她也正在那邊工作，但我們已經不是搭擋了。
請問檢察官，有沒有進一步要傳喚的證人或是調查事證？
Prosecutor, are there any witnesses you wish to subpoena or evidences you wish to show?
希望能夠傳訊被告的同事，也就是任職伯元補習班的王彩燕以證人身分到庭，說明他與被告之間的關係，以及那些簡訊的撰寫背景及目的。

I wish to subpoena the defendant’s coworker Tsai-Yen wang from the cram school. I would like her to explain the relationship she has between her and the defendant, and her reason for sending the text messages.
請問告訴人有沒有任何希望本庭代為調查的事證？
Plaintiff, are there any evidence that you wish for the court to investigate?
我聽說該補習班針對他們兩個人的關係，有採取一些行動。其中更有試圖說服該女王彩燕離職一事，不知道能不能向那個補習班求證這件事情。

I heard the cram school has taken some actions in response to the relationship between those two people. Somebody has tried to ask Tsai-Yen Wang to leave her position. I wonder if the cram school can… if there are any evidence to show this fact?
那請問被告，有沒有任何希望法庭為你調查的事證？現在的情況是，你的碩士學位早就已經在中華民國101年12月05日結束，實在沒有理由以做作業為藉口來解釋你跟王彩燕的簡訊互動，尤其是你們的簡訊互動大多在晚上九點鐘以後進行，實在起人疑竇，你有沒有任何證據，可以幫助自己的案情呢？

Now, the defendant, are there any evidence you wish for the court to help you investigate? The current situation is your degree courses have ended on December 5th 2012. Homework assignments is no excuse for the texting between you and Tsai-Yen Wang. Especially when your text messages are mainly sent after 9 PM at night. This arises suspicion. Do you have any evidence that may help you with your case?

I cannot think of any evidence that the court can investigate on my behalf. As I said, the reason for the communication between my colleague and me was very simple. I only wanted to improve my language ability and continue to learn Chinese.
我想不到任何證據可以請法院幫我調查的。就像我之前提到的，我和我同事往來的原因其實很簡單：我只想讓我的中文進步，然後不斷地練習中文而已。
那本庭訂中華民國103年06月09日下午4點30分進行證人詰問程序，請告訴人、被告都要到庭，如果有必要，雙方都可以請辯護人，明白嗎？

The next…witness… the next court for the case will be on June 9th 2014, 4:30PM. The plaintiff and the defendant are required to come to court in person. If it is necessary, you can all appoint lawyers, do you understand?
我明白。
I understand.
I understand.
我明白。
今天庭期到此結束。
OK, our court ends here.
今為 刑事庭 簡易字2887號 通姦案件之準備程序
Today we’re here for the preparatory procedure of the adultery case, case number 888.
通譯宣讀 「通譯結文：今為貴院簡易字2887號 通姦案件之準備程序為通譯，謹當為公正誠實之譯述，此結，通譯○○○，中華民國103年5月27日。」

John Anderston

1.你有權保持緘默，毋需違背意志做任何陳述。
You have the right to remain silent and do not have to make any statement which is against your will.
2.你有權選任法定辯護人，若為低收入戶、中低收入戶、原住民或其他符合法律規定之資格，得請求法律服務。

You have the right ti a lawyer. If you come from a low income family, a medium-and low-income family, or if you are an aborigine or meet other qualifications set by the law, you may ask the court for legal assistance.
3.你有權請法院調查任何對你有利的證據。
Last, you have the right to ask the court to investigate any evidence which may help you with your case.
被告是否了解以上權利？
Do you fully understand you rights?
I understand.
了解
今天我們進行外遇案件之準備程序。告訴人陳玉華提起這次的訴訟案件，主要是因為她的先生John Anderston跟所任職之補習班同事從往過密，且告訴人在其先生的手機簡訊記錄中查到一些親密訊息，再加上被告常常會藉故加班，或是深夜與其同事王彩燕進行視訊或其他方式之交談，因告訴人所蒐集之通訊內容已超過同事情誼，故提起此告訴。被告，你太太懷疑你有外遇，要告你通姦罪，你作何辯解？

Today, we’re here for the preparatory procedure of the adultery case. Yu-Hua Chen filed this case. The main reason is that her husband, John Anderson sent intimate messages to his colleague working at the cram school. The person who filed this case checked the messages of her husband and found some intimate messages. Moreover, the defendant would make up some reasons, umm..for example, to have extra working hours in order to teleconference with his colleague, Tsai-Yen Wang. The intimate messages the plaintiff has found out were beyond coworker’s relationship. Therefore, the plaintiff decided to file this case. Defendant, you have violated the adultery, what is your plea?
Not guilty, of course.
當然無罪啊
在今天的準備程序中，主要程序為詢問被告與其同事之通訊細節，目的是為了釐清是否被告與其同事實有外遇情事，足以構成通姦罪。雙方明白程序嗎？

In today’s preparatory procedure, our main goal is to ask for the details of the intimate messages sent between the defendant and his colleague, so that we can confirm whether the defendant and his colleague do constitute adultery. Do both parties understand our procedure?
我明白
Yes.
I understand.
明白
先請問告訴人，你跟妳先生結婚多久了？有小孩嗎？
First, plaintiff, how long have you been married to your husband? Do you two have any children?
我跟我先生已經結婚四年了，我們沒有小孩。
We’ve been married for four years, and we do not have any children.
那你跟妳先生是在台灣結婚的嗎？還是在國外結婚的？
Were you married in Taiwan or in a foreign country?
我跟我先生是在台灣認識的，四年前他剛來台灣，主要想要教葡萄牙文。
I met my husband in Taiwan. Four years ago, he came to Taiwan in order to teach Portuguese.
那過去幾年，他在台灣的工作都是教葡萄牙文嗎？
Then for the past few years, has his work always been teaching Portuguese?
我們剛開始認識的時候，他是一位葡萄牙文老師，在我們結婚之後，他還有繼續教葡萄牙文，可是葡萄牙文在台灣並不是一個有很多人學的語言，所以他的授課時數一直很不穩定，有時候甚至一兩個月的課程都會是空窗期，後來因為希望能夠讓收入比較穩定，他想要開始教英文，可是因為他的母語並不是英文，所以他決定要去進修。

When we first met, he was a Portuguese teacher, and after we got married, he was still teaching Portuguese. However, among Taiwanese, Portuguese is not a very prevalent and famous language. Therefore, his teaching hours are not too many. Sometimes, he even had a period between a month or two between jobs. Afterwards, in order to have a more stable income, he decided to teach English. However, his mother tongue is not English; therefore, he decided to learn English and seek an advanced degree.
你剛剛講到他決定要進修，是在台灣念一個學位嗎？
What you mean by “seeking an advanced degree” is that he planned to pursue a higher degree in Taiwan?
不是，因為他希望能夠在台灣教英文，所以必須取得的學位是關於英語教學的。他在網路上找到了一個美國加州所提供的遠距教學課程，讓他可以不用人去美國，都可以用函授的方式，完成課程的要求，這樣子在完成所有的學分之後，就可以取得碩士學位。他的計畫是，透過這樣子的一個美國學位，能夠在台灣找到英文教師的工作。

No. He hopes to teach English in Taiwan; therefore, he needs to receive a degree which is related to English TESOL, and he found a distance learning program which is launched in California. Through this distance learning program, he’s able to learn online without flying to America. Therefore, after receiving the credits, he will be able to receive a master’s degree. His plan was that through getting this master’s degree, he will be able to teach English in Taiwan.
那他跟這次所謂的外遇對象，是什麼樣的關係呢？
Then I would like to ask what is the true relationship between his and the person who he had an affair with?
他們是補習班的同事。那個補習班有安排所謂的中師跟外師搭檔教學。那個女的就是他班上的中師。
Well, they are colleagues at the cram school. At the cram school, the woman was partnered with my husband, and the woman was a Chinese teacher, and my husband an English teacher.
你怎麼會知道他們有外遇呢？
Then how can you proof that they did have an affair?
一開始我只是注意到我先生常常會留在學校加班，我問過他好幾次，只不過是個美語補習班，有什麼好加班的？他告訴我說，因為要和中師搭檔教學，有很多需要溝通的地方。一開始我真的沒有懷疑他，可是我後來發現，他常常會在回家之後，接到一些電話，而接到電話的時候，都不會在我面前講，還會特地到書房去講。這讓我開始有所懷疑。所以我就查看了他的手機。

Well, at the beginning, I just noticed my husband often worked for longer hours at the cram school. And I asked him many times about how come? It was just a cram school! There’s no need, no way to have longer working hours. He told me that he needed to discuss about teaching matters and communicate with his Chinese partner. Therefore, at the beginning, I didn’t doubt him at all. But afterwards, I’ve found out that he will often receive calls after work. The strange this was, when he was answering these calls, he would just go back to his study room and answer the calls instead of answering them in front of me. Therefore, this made me very skeptical of him, and I checked his mobile phone.
在手機中你看到什麼不尋常的嗎？
Then did you find anything wrong or anything strange?
他的通訊紀錄中常常看到同一個電話號碼，所以我很好奇的又去查他的簡訊，查了之後才發現他跟一個女的幾乎每天都通簡訊。

Well, I’ve found out that one number appeared very, very often in his cell phone record. Therefore, I was so curious that I checked his instant messages. Then, I found out that he sent messages with a woman nearly every day.
就算是發簡訊，也還好吧？難道內容很不宜嗎？
It’s just merely messages. How about the content? Are they unusual or intimate?
如果只是普通的簡訊也就罷了，可是他是一個已婚的人，怎麼會讓對方發一些很親密的字句呢? 之前我有提供一些他們的簡訊內容給法院，應該都在卷夾裡面了。

If they were just normal messages, then I’m okay with that. However, he is married to me, how can he allow that woman to send him such intimate messages? I provided some content of the messages to the court earlier. I believe they’re in the folder.
提示偵卷(一)第13頁。這邊裡面有幾通簡訊內容，請被告看一下。請問這是你手機上的簡訊內容嗎？
Let’s look at evidence one, page thirteen. Defendant, please take a look at some of the messages here. Were these messages the same with the messages in your cell phone?
Yes, this is a message on my cell phone.
是的。一模一樣。

她不只是我的家教，還是我真正的朋友。

Then my job became the issue between the two of us. We fought from time to time over this issue. She didn’t believe that I have tried my best, and I have no way to let her understand my frustration and the difficult situation I have faced.
剛結婚的時候，我們的確渡過了一段美好時光，但是問題出在我的工作。我想要在台灣教葡萄牙文，但是授課時數很不穩定，所以我的工作就成了我們之間的問題。我們常常為這個問題吵架。她不相信我已經盡力了，我也無法讓她理解我遇到的挫折和困難。
好，那回到你剛剛所講的碩士課程。請問你碩士課程是什麼時候開始的，結束了嗎？你拿到學位了嗎？
Well, let’s go back to the master program, which you just talked about. When did you start your program, and does it end? Did you receive the degree?

I first started the program in Spring 2010. It was a two-year program. I should have finished the program in December 2012. I didn’t finish the program because I was working part-time and didn’t get enough time to do my course assignments. Like I said, my wife has never been very supportive. I felt that I was pursuing the degree all alone by myself. I became too tired and too frustrated.
我的碩士課程從2010年春天開始，是兩年的課程，應該要在2012年12月完成課程。但是我沒有完成課程，因為我有兼差，沒有時間完成我的課程作業。像我說的，我太太並不支持我。我覺得是自己一路單獨奮鬥，感覺很累、很有挫折。
你是說這個課程原來是兩年期的，可是你最後沒有完成。為什麼呢？
Do you mean that the program should have lasted for two years, but you did not complete it, and why?
I couldn’t finish all the course requirement.
我無法完成所有的課程要求。
那你註冊在學的最後一個學期，是什麼時候結束的呢?
What did it end, the last semester that you registered?
The last semester of my registration was fall 2012.
我註冊的最後一個學期是在2012年秋季。
如果誠如你所述，你最後一個學期的結束日期是中華民國101年12月5日，那麼合理推斷在那個學期之後，你就不會有任何作業了吧?但是你與同事之間的簡訊聯絡卻一直到課程結束六個月都還在進行。這是為什麼呢？

If as you said, your last semester ended on December 5th in 2012, based on reasonable doubts, you would have no assignments after that, right? How would you continue sending messages with your colleagues even until six months after the program was ended?

Well, I might not have finished that program but it doesn’t mean I didn’t want to improve my language ability. Even when I failed the program, I still wanted to improve my Chinese ability, so I continued to study on my own.
我也許無法完成課程，但不代表我不想精進語言能力。即使我不能完成課程，我還是很想加強我的中文能力，所以我繼續自我學習。
你的意思是，儘管你沒有完成那個碩士課程，你還是想要不斷的學中文，讓你的中文更加流利，是嗎？
Do you mean that even though  you failed to complete the master program, you still want to sharpen your Chinese ability and make your Chinese more fluent, right?
Yes, that’s why I asked my colleague for help.
是，我請同事幫忙。
那你的這位同事，她所扮演的角色就像你的家教囉？
So that colleague plays a role as a tutor, right?
She has been not only a tutor but also a true friend.
她不僅是個家教，也是我真正的好友。
你有付錢給她嗎？
Have you offered her any pay?
No, I offered to pay her but she declined.
沒有，我想要付她錢，但她拒絕了。
如果你沒有付錢給她，她為什麼要在半夜應該就寢的時候還不辭辛勞的發簡訊回答你的問題呢？這是不是已經超過了一個同事應該做的事情？
If you had not paid her, why would she like to send you messages to answer your questions even in the middle of the night, when she should go to bed for sleep?
That’s why I said she was a very supportive friend. She was using her own time to help me learn Chinese.
因此我認為她是非常支持我的，她用自己的時間幫助我學習中文。
你現在還有在那家補習班教英文嗎？
Do you still work as an English teacher at that cram school now?
Yes, I am still working there.
是的，我還在那裡工作。
那這位同事王彩燕也還在那裏服務嗎？
Is that colleague, 王彩燕, still working there, too?
She is also still working there but we don’t team up any more.
她也還在那裡工作，但我們不再是工作夥伴了。
請問檢察官，有沒有進一步要傳喚的證人或是調查事證？
The prosecutor, do you have any further evidence to be investigated or people to be subpoenaed?
希望能夠傳訊被告的同事，也就是任職伯元補習班的王彩燕以證人身分到庭，說明他與被告之間的關係，以及那些簡訊的撰寫背景及目的。

We would like to subpoena the colleague of the defendant, 王彩燕, as a witness to the court to elaborate her relationship with the defendant and the background as well as the purpose of writing these messages?
請問告訴人有沒有任何希望本庭代為調查的事證？
The plaintiff, do you want the court to investigate any evidence for you?
我聽說該補習班針對他們兩個人的關係，有採取一些行動。其中更有試圖說服該女王彩燕離職一事，不知道能不能向那個補習班求證這件事情。

I have heard that the cram school has taken some actions because of their relationship. The cram school even tried to persuade Ms. 王彩燕 to leave the job position. I am wandering whether we can verify these facts with the cram school.
那請問被告，有沒有任何希望法庭為你調查的事證？現在的情況是，你的碩士學位早就已經在中華民國101年12月05日結束，實在沒有理由以做作業為藉口來解釋你跟王彩燕的簡訊互動，尤其是你們的簡訊互動大多在晚上九點鐘以後進行，實在起人疑竇，你有沒有任何證據，可以幫助自己的案情呢？

The defendant, do you have any evidence that you want the court to investigate for you? The current situation is that your master program was ended on December 5th, 2012, and there are no reasons for you to take completing assignments as an excuse to explain the interaction of texting messages between you and 王彩燕, especially your interactions were mostly after 9 o’clock at night. This behaviour causes doubts. Do you have any evidence that can help you with your case?

I cannot think of any evidence that the court can investigate on my behalf. As I said, the reason for the communication between my colleague and me was very simple. I only wanted to improve my language ability and continue to learn Chinese.
我無法想到有任何證據是法院可以代表我調查的。如我所說，我和同事間的溝通很簡單。我只是想要精進中文能力，繼續學習中文。
那本庭訂中華民國103年06月09日下午4點30分進行證人詰問程序，請告訴人、被告都要到庭，如果有必要，雙方都可以請辯護人，明白嗎？

The next court date is set at 4:30 in the afternoon on June 9th, 2014 for asking the witness. The plaintiff and the defendant, please do  come on that day. If necessary, the both parties have the right to hire lawyers. Do you understand?
我明白。
I understand.
I understand.
我明白。
今天庭期到此結束。
Today’s court ends here.

如起訴書所載。
As stated in the indictment.
被告因妨害名譽案件被檢察官起訴，起因是被告涉嫌在中華民國108年12月1日到109年1月20日之間，在網際網路論壇，名為Foreign Land (外國園地)，發表一連串的評論，雖此論壇之主要目的是提供在台居留外國人士交流之平台，但被告卻利用這樣一個平台進行對告訴人公司之批評，致使告訴人公司名譽受損。對此妨害名譽之告訴，有何辯解？

This incident happened on December 1, 2019 to January 20, 2020. The accused post the comments on the internet chat forum, Foreign Land, which provides foreigners in Taiwan to communicate with others. However, the accused used this platform to criticize the accuser’s company, which damaged the accuser’s company reputation, so the accused was prosecuted. What’s your plea?
I plead not guilty.
我沒有罪。
請問你知道「外國園地」這個論壇嗎？
The defendant, do you know the Internet forum, Foreign Land
Yes, Foreign Land is a forum very popular among foreigners.
我知道這個Foreign Land非常受歡迎，尤其是在外國人當中。
可以簡要的描述你在這個平台上的活動嗎？
Can you summarize your activities on Foreign Land?
I am a registered member, which means I can read others’ posts and post articles for others to read.
我是有註冊的會員，我可以看到別人發表的文章，同時也可以發表自己的文章給別人看。
你常常在上面發表文章嗎，可以大概抓個頻率嗎，大概多久發表一篇文章？
How often you post comments on the Foreign Land? ...
I won’t say I regularly post articles on Foreign Land. I only have postings when I want to share some concerns or vent my feelings.
我不會說我常常在上面發文，我只有在我有一些疑慮，還有想要發洩一些情緒的時候才會在上面發文。
提示偵券(一)65頁。這一頁是取自中華民國108年12月13日在「外國園地」中發表的內容。請你看一下，這是你寫的嗎？
… The page is about your comments on Foreign Land on December 13, 2019. Please take a look. Are these your posts?
It seems to be my posting but it was posted some time ago, I am not sure if the article is in its entirety.
我有發表這個文章，但是是在很久之前發表的，所以我不確定文章的完整性。
你在文中所提到的主要內容為何？請陳述。
Please describe the main content
As you can see from the copy, I posted some concerns and questions regarding Winwin company, especially about how foreigners were treated by that company.
…我在上面發表了我的疑慮、對公司的一些問題，還有他們怎麼對待外國員工。
你剛剛講到的某一公司，請問有在任何一篇文章當中，明確指出該公司的全名嗎？
You mentioned the full name of the company. Did you point out its name in any comments?
Yes, I am sure I have used the company’s full name, Winwin.
我確定我有在上面用公司的全名，贏贏。
你在65頁的內容中，提到該公司常常在雇用外國人時，沒有照勞基法的規定提供基本工時、工資、福利，更不時有未幫外國人申請工作簽證的情況。請問，你這樣講，有證據嗎？

In Page 65, you mentioned this company hired foreign employee without following Labor Basic Law about work time, basic wage and benefits. The company didn’t help foreigners apply for working visa. For this, do you have any evidence?

I did mention those issues. I did not have evidence. I heard those issues from some other foreign friends who either worked for that company or had experiences with that company. As a result, I expressed my concerns in the question format, meaning I asked all those questions regarding working hours, basic salary, benefits and ARC application with the hope that Winwin would come forward to respond to my questions.
我有講過這個問題，但我沒有證據。我是從我一些在那個公司工作的朋友或是在那邊有經驗的朋友聽來的。我有在論壇發表一些問題，包含了工作時數、基本薪資、福利，還有是否幫員工申請居留簽證…。
你的意思是說，你是從其他外國朋友那邊聽到這些細節，但不是本人的第一手資料，是嗎？
You mean that you heard from you friends, but it isn’t your first-hand information, right?
True. I heard those details from other friends, also the registered members of Foreign Land.
沒錯，我是從朋友還有一些註冊會員那邊聽到這些小細節的。
那你怎麼可以在一個公開的論壇中，直接把聽來的東西，就做了轉述呢？
How could you repost this information on Foreign Land?

I didn’t quote others and post the concerns as accusations. Instead, all my comments were questions. I was hoping Winwin would provide some sort of clarifications so that the foreign community would not hold any wrong ideas against that company.
我沒有直接引用，我只是發表言論、提出我的問題。我只是希望贏贏公司可以釐清這些問題，讓外國人不會對這家公司有誤解。
什麼叫做你都是用問題的方式來進行批評？可以解釋一下嗎？
What do you mean that you criticize in questions? Can you explain it?
For example, I asked in one posting “Is it true that Winwin sometimes does not help foreign employees to apply for an ARC, the legal working permit they need for working in Taiwan legally?”.
舉例來說，我發表了一個問題，就是那個公司有沒有幫外國人申請居留證，外國人可以合法居留嗎?
所以你發表這一系列文章的目的只是為了釐清所謂的「真相」，是嗎？
So, you posted a series of comments just in order to find out the truth?
Yes, I only wanted to get some clarifications or explanations. However, instead of responding to my questions directly, Winwin chose to file this lawsuit against me.
是的，我只是想要得到一些澄清和解釋。然而，這個公司沒有直接回答我的問題，而是對我提出告訴。
雖然告訴人有提供他們自外國園地抓下來文章內容，但他們也告訴檢方，這些內容並不完整。所以就你記憶所及，你大概連續發表了幾篇呢？
Although the accuser provided some comments from Foreign Land and told the police, but the content wasn’t entire. …

As I stated before, it has been some time already. I cannot recall exactly how many articles I posted on Foreign Land, perhaps eight to ten? The problem is when this lawsuit began, the administrator of Foreign Land decided to delete my postings to avoid trouble.
我之前說過的，那些文章已經發表一段時間了，所以我不能明確告訴你我發了多少文章到論壇，也許是8到10篇。問題是當他們提出告訴後，版主就把我的文章全部刪除，以免造成麻煩。
你的意思是說當這個訴訟開始進行的時候，那個論壇的版主就進行了刪文的動作嗎？
You mean when the lawsuit began, the administrator of the forum deleted all of your posts, right?
Yes, that is correct.
是這樣沒錯。
也就是說，你完全沒有辦法確定你一共為此事件發表過幾篇文章？
That is, you can’t assure how many comments you posted, right?
That’s correct, too.
這樣也沒錯。
那就你記憶所及，你曾經接到過該公司任何希望你停止批評他們的要求嗎？你有照做嗎？
Did you remember that the company asked you to stop criticizing? Did you stop posting comments?
I think towards the end of my postings, I did get a request from Winwin, asking me to stop posting articles about their company. I didn’t stop immediately because, again, I was only asking questions.
我認為如果要我停止發文的話，我應該會收到一些叫我停止發文的請求，我沒有立即停止，因為就像我前面所說的，我只是問問題而已。
所以你還是堅持，因為你都是用問題的方式來發表評論，並沒有直接毀謗該公司名譽的事實，是嗎？
So, you mean you insist on posting comments in question, but not libeling the company, right?
It was never my intention to defame Winwin. I don’t quite understand how a series of questions could possibly constitute “defamation.”
我從來都不是故意要毀謗這個公司，我不懂為什麼問問題會造成毀謗。
那請問告訴人，貴公司是什麼時候開始瞭解到，在「外國園地」當中，有關於貴公司的文章？
Now, I’m going to ask accuser some questions. Accuser, when do you realize that some comments are posted on Foreign Land about your company?

This issue first came to our attention around December 2019. My wife and I personally were not active in that kind of forums. We were only informed by some friends about the malicious comments on Foreign Land until then.
我第一次知道此事是在2019年12月。我和我老婆在這樣的論壇並不活躍。我們是在那時才被朋友告知有這些惡意評論。
對於剛剛被告表示他只是提出一連串的問題，希望貴公司回答這些問題，並沒有以陳述方式毀謗貴公司的名譽。你有何意見？
According to the accused, he just posted a series of questions and hoped that the company can respond to him. He didn’t say something directly to defame your company. Did you have any opinion?

That’s not true. In English, even when comments are made in the question format, they still carry enough force to make readers wonder or question the facts implied by the questions. Even when the defendant said he only asked questions, damage was done to my company.
這不是事實。在英文表達中，即使用問題方式評論，也能讓閱讀的人產生好奇或質疑事實。即使被告說他只是問問題，也足以毀謗我的公司。
你的意思是說，不管對方是否用問題方式提出質疑，你們公司的名譽實際上都有所損害嗎？請解釋一下。
Do you meant that whether the other party posted the questions, the company has been defamed? Can you explain?

Yes, when the defendant asked those questions, it caused doubt and suspicion in the circle of foreigners in Taiwan. Foreigners form their own circle here in Taiwan and rumors travel fast. That’s why even the Labor Bureau paid several visits to our company, trying to find out if we were involved in the matters posted on Foreign Land.
是的。當被告問了這些問題，就能讓這些住在台灣的外國人懷疑這間公司。這些外國人在這個論壇裡自成一圈。在這圈子裡，謠言傳得非常快。這就是爲什麼勞工局多次造訪我的公司，來看這些評論中的問題是否真的存在。
那勞工局前往貴公司瞭解外國人的雇用狀況，以及居留證的申請細節，有發現什麼不符合的地方嗎？
When the Labor Bureau went to the company to understand the situation of hiring the foreigner and their application of ARC, did anything happen which didn’t meet the requirements?
No, the representatives from the Bureau came but did not find anything wrong with our company or our hiring practice.
沒有，勞工局派的代表並沒有查到任何不符規定的事。
如果勞工局的調查並沒有發現什麼不妥之處，或是違法之處，再加上剛剛被告也解釋，他撰寫這些文章的目的都只是希望貴公司能夠進行自清的動作，有沒有可能雙方進行和解呢？

If the Labor Bureau didn’t find anything which is illegal or not appropriate, just like the accused explained that he wrote these articles only to hope that the company can clarify, can both parties consider settlement?

We previously tried but failed to reach any conclusion. I would only consider settling this case with two things from the defendant. First, he has to formally apologize to Winwin for posting those inappropriate comments on Foreign Land. Second, as he said he heard all those details from “other foreign friends,” he should provide the names of those people to clear his own name.
我們之前有試著調解，但失敗了。我可以考慮和解，但對被告有兩件事的要求。第一，他必須為他不妥言論，正式向我的公司道歉。第二，如他剛才所說他是從其他外國朋友中聽到這些消息，他必須提供這些朋友的全名
被告，就像剛剛告訴人所指出，如果要進行和解，他希望由你這邊採取兩個行動，第一，正式道歉，對於在外國園地所發表的文章，不論你的文章是否造成告訴人公司實質上的名譽受損，對方都希望你提出道歉。第二，你剛剛前面指出，你是從一些外國友人那邊，聽到告訴人公司有違法對待外國勞工之嫌，你可以提供這些友人的姓名嗎？

The accused, just like accuser said, if you want a settlement, you need to take two actions. First, you need to apologize formally. For the comments you posted on Foreign Land, whether they constituted defamation, you need to apologize. Second, you have mentioned that you heard these things from your foreign friend. The company treated the employees illegally. Can you provide the names of your friends?

Your Honor, hope you can understand.

這是我同事發給的，因為那時候我休假兩天，她有點擔心，所有才有這個簡訊。我的同事在美國念書，她講話比較開放，那就是她表達方式，至於my love，那就是我們稱呼我們在乎的人的方式。

No, that is a very common expression between good friends or friends who care a lot for each other.
對阿，這就是一個很普通的稱呼方式。好朋友之間就這樣。
那她前面那句呢？
what about the previous message?

我說了，那就是她關心我的話而已。我們是工作上的搭檔，所以她關心我也很正常。
你的意思是，對方只是因為你兩天沒有上班，才發這樣的簡訊表達說因為沒有你上課的輔助，所以她很想你？就只是這樣子嗎？

She sent you this message to help you with the assignment? What does that mean?

就像我太太所述，我有在進修，我需要修滿30個學生，所以我需要做點功課和練習也是很正常的。

我的課程是關於TESOL 英文教學，它除了包含教學課程以外還有包含一些文化還有本身語言能力。

對，我記得至少有三堂課是有關於文化和溝通。

這些文化溝通課程給的功課，會因為不同的人而不一樣。就我來說，我在台灣，我想要一個教英文的教職，那我就必須要證明我的中文能力很好。所以我有很多功課是關於中英的翻譯。

對，當然我也有被…也有被訓練一些寫作和口說方面的能力。

對，那就是我的作業，你知道中文句子很多時候對外國人很難，我就請我的同事把句子翻譯成英文，然後再用簡訊傳給我。
你的意思就是說，因為你問了你同事那一句中文，她就把答案打成英文發簡訊給你，這就是當時的情況嗎？也就是說，這封簡訊只是作業的解答嗎？
So you asked your colleague about the Chinese sentence and she translated it into English and sent it to you. This is the situation at that time? That is only the sentence of the assignment?

那句話只是我作業的答案而已。
那再提示偵卷(一)第14到16頁數的所有簡訊內容，這些請你看一下，都是你因為要做作業，尋求對方幫助，對方才發給你的簡訊嗎？
Exhibition 1, page 14 to 16. Please check the messages. Are these messages only for the assignments? They are only the answers to the assignments?

對，這些簡訊都是我的功課而已。

我覺得我的太太真的想太多了，我知道她一直嫌我不夠專注在家庭。我想要庭上知道，她打從一開始就沒有支持我，關於我對碩士學位的進修。如果她當初有在我進修的時候幫忙我，那我也不需要問我的同事，我覺得她要對她的誤解負責。

我們一開始結婚的時候是很快樂，但問題是我的工作，我教葡萄牙文，授課時數不穩定。所以工作成了我們爭吵的重點，我們常為這個在吵，她不相信我已經很盡力了，我也無法讓她知道我多沮喪。

我從2015年秋天開始修這個碩士學位，我預計在2017年五月修完，但是我沒有拿到這個學位，因為我有一些兼職，我沒有時間去做作業。就像我剛剛說的，我的太太從來沒有幫忙過我，我一直都是一個人在做這件事情，我真的很累也很沮喪。

我沒辦法完成課程的所有作業還有一些課程要求。

我註冊的最後日期是2017年的春天。
如果誠如你所述，你最後一個學期的結束日期是中華民國106年5月，那麼合理推斷在那個學期之後，你就不會有任何的作業了。但是你與同事之間的簡訊聯絡卻一直到課程結束後七個月都還在進行。這是為什麼呢？

Well, I might not have finished that program but it doesn’t mean I didn’t want to improve my language ability. Even when I failed the program, I still wanted to improve my Chinese ability, so I continued to study on my own.
我沒有完成課程不代表我不想學好中文，我還是想要精進我的語言能力，所以我就自學了
你的意思是，儘管你沒有完成那個碩士課程，你還是想要不斷的學中文，讓你的中文更加流利，是嗎？

Yes, that’s why I asked my colleague for help
對，這就是為甚麼我請我的同事幫忙?
那你的這位同事，她所扮演的角色就像你的家教囉？

她不只是家教，她是一個很好的朋友。
你有付錢給她嗎

沒有，我原本想要付錢給她，但她拒絕了。
如果你沒有付錢給她，她為什麼要在半夜應該就寢的時候還不辭辛勞的發簡訊回答你的問題呢？這是不是已經超過了一個同事應該做的事情？
If you did not pay her, why she still send you the message during bed time? Is it beyond coworkers’ relationship?
That’s why I said she was a very supportive friend. She was using her own time to help me learn Chinese.
我說過她是一個很支持的朋友，她用她自己的時間來幫我。
你現在還有在那家補習班教英文嗎？
Do you still teach in that cram school?

對，我還在那工作。
那這位同事也還在那裏服務嗎？

She is also still working there but we do not team up any more.
她還在那工作，但我們不再是搭檔了。

希望能夠傳訊被告的同事，也就是任職美而美補習班的黃蓉兒以證人身分到庭，說明他與被告之間的關係，以及那些簡訊的撰寫背景及目的。

請問告訴人有沒有任何希望本庭代為調查的事證？

我聽說美而美補習班針對他們兩個人的關係，有採取一些行動。其中更有試圖說服該女黃蓉兒離職一事，不知道能不能向那個補習班求證這件事情。

我沒有任何想要法庭代為調查的證據，我和同事的關係真的很簡單，我只是想要精進我的中文能力。

我們剛開始認識的時候，他是一位葡萄牙文老師，在我們結婚之後，他還有繼續教葡萄牙文，可是葡萄牙文在台灣並不是一個有很多人學的語言，所以他的授課時數一直很不穩定，有時候甚至一兩個月的課程都會是空窗期，後來因為希望能夠讓收入比較穩定，他想要開始教英文，可是因為他的母語並不是英文，所以他決定要去進修。

雖然我沒有完成學位，但並不代表我不想精進我的語文能力。因此我仍繼續和我的同事來往，希望能夠精進我的中文。

如果你沒有付錢給她，她為什麼要在半夜應該就寢的時候還不辭辛勞的發簡訊回答你的問題呢？這是不是已經超過了一個同事應該做的事情？

所以我才說他是一個很支持我的朋友，他用他自己的時間幫助我。
你現在還有在那家補習班教英文嗎？

是，他仍在那家補習班，但我們不再繼續搭擋合作了。

When we met each other at that time, he was a Portuguese teacher. And after we get married, he was still a Portuguese teacher. In Taiwan, there is a few people learning Portuguese. 他們是補習班的同事。那個補習班有安排所謂的中師跟外師搭檔教學。那個女的就是他班上的中師。

你怎麼會知道他們有外遇呢？

一開始我只是注意到我先生常常會留在學校加班，我問過他好幾次，只不過是個美語補習班，有什麼好加班的？他告訴我說，因為要和中師搭檔教學，有很多需要溝通的地方。一開始我真的沒有懷疑他，可是我後來發現，他常常會在回家之後，接到一些電話，而接到電話的時候，都不會在我面前講，還會特地到書房去講。這讓我開始有所懷疑。所以我就查看了他的手機。

如果只是普通的簡訊也就罷了，可是他是一個已婚的人。怎麼會讓對方發一些很親密的字句呢。之前我有提供一些他們的簡訊內容給法院，應該都在卷夾裡面了。

那是我同事傳給我的，然後我記得那天我已經兩天沒去上班了，所以他才傳給我，關心我一下。我同事是在美國受教育的，所以她非常的開放，然後她之所以會叫我親愛的，那是她表現在乎的人的稱呼方式。

嗯對啊，那是我們對於親密的朋友會有的稱呼，並沒有什麼特別的意思。

對，就像是簡訊上傳的一樣，這根本就沒有什麼大不了的啊。

她傳這封簡訊是為了如何幫我用中文敘述我的中文作業。

我老婆剛剛也有提到了，我因為想要找一個英文教師的工作，所以我參加了一個遠距教學的碩士課程，然後在課程裡，我必須完成30個學分，我才可以拿到學位，所以這個作業是在課程裡面所要求的。

我的課程主要是英語教學的課程，然後裡面還會包含一些語言能力，還有文化之間的溝通課程。
所以你拿的是英語教學碩士，可是裡面有一些文化溝通的課程，是嗎？

是的，我記得有三門課是有關文化溝通的課。

文化溝通課程的作業會是因人而異的，以我來舉例好了，因為我想要在台灣找一個英語教學的工作，所以呢，我的作業就必須對我的中文是很要求的。所以呢，我的作業當中有很多是中英文需要翻譯的東西。

是的沒錯，而且我還要精進我的閱讀跟寫作的能力。
好，那再回到我們剛剛那句話。你說這是你的作業嗎？

對的，那是我的作業，然後那句句子必須中文翻成英文，你也知道的，外國人學習中文是很辛苦的，因為有些字我們真的認不出來，所以我就請我的同事幫忙，然後請她幫我翻譯成中文再傳送過來。
你的意思就是說，因為你問了你同事那一句中文，她就把答案打成英文發簡訊給你，這就是當時的情況嗎？也就是說，這封簡訊只是作業的解答嗎？
So, do you mean that you ask for the translation of the Chinese sentence, and your colleague translates it in English? So, the message is just an answer for the assignment?
That message was only the answer to my homework.
是的，那個簡訊只是我功課的解答。
那再提示偵卷(一)第14到16頁數的所有簡訊內容，這些請你看一下，都是你因為要做作業，尋求對方幫助，對方才發給你的簡訊嗎？
Let’s show the evidence 1, page 14 to 16. Are all these messages just the answers for your assignment?
Yes, all these messages were for the same purpose of completing my assignments.
是的，這些簡訊都是為了要協助我完成作業的解答。
那針對你太太說，你跟你的同事有外遇一事，你有何解釋？
So, what’s your opinion about your wife’s thought, you have affair with your co-worker?

My wife really thinks too much of this matter. I know she is not satisfied with my ability of supporting the family. I want the court to know that she, from the very beginning of my study, has never shown any support. She was not willing to help me complete my degree. If she had been a bit more supportive, I would not have asked my colleague to help me. I think she should be blamed for this whole misunderstanding.
我太太對於這件事真的是想太多了，而且我剛開始攻讀這個遠距教學課程的時候，她就沒有給予我任何支持，然後她還覺得我對這個家庭不用心。她完全不支持我攻讀這個課程，所以我有作業難題的時候也只好去找我的同事，她應該要為這整件誤會負責。
根據你的說法，你們夫妻之間似乎有些相處不愉快的情況？
So, according to your thought, is there anything unhappy between you and your wife?

At the beginning of our marriage, we did have some good time. But the problem is my employment. I tried teaching Portuguese in Taiwan but could not get stable teaching hours. Then my job became the issue between the two of us. We fought from time to time over this issue. She didn’t believe that I have tried my best, and I have no way to let her understand my frustration and the difficult situation I have faced.
我們一開始是相處非常愉快的，但是呢，主要就是我工作的問題，因為我想要在台灣教葡萄牙語，但是這個教學時數是非常不固定的，所以我們就有一些爭吵。所以這就變成我們之間最大的問題，她不相信我真的已經盡力去找工作了，所以我們就常常為了這個事情爭吵，然後這讓我非常的挫折，然後我也不知道如何面對她。

So, let’s go back to your master degree program. When did it begin, and is it over?

I first started the program in fall 2015. It was a two-year program. I should have finished the program in May 2017. I didn’t finish the program because I was working part-time and didn’t get enough time to do my course assignments. Like I said, my wife has never been very supportive. I felt that I was pursuing the degree all alone by myself. I became too tired and too frustrated.
我在2015年開始我的碩士課程的，預計在2017年會拿到學位，但因為我一直有在做兼職，最後學分有點拖延，所以沒有拿到這個學位。就像我所說的，我太太從來不支持我讀這個學位，然後這段期間我遇到學業上的瓶頸的時候也沒人可以支持我，這讓我覺得很累又很挫折。
你是說這個課程原來是兩年期的，可是你最後沒有完成。為什麼呢？
You mention that the master degree was a two-year degree, how did you fail to complete?
I couldn’t finish all the course assignments and also the course requirement.
我沒辦法完成所有的學分，還有一些其他課程要求。
那你註冊在學的最後一個學期，到什麼時候為止？
When was your last semester of your registration?
The last semester of my registration was spring 2017.
我最後註冊的學期是2017年的下學期。
如果誠如你所述，你最後一個學期的結束日期是中華民國106年5月，那麼合理推斷在那個學期之後，你就不會有任何的作業了。但是你與同事之間的簡訊聯絡卻一直到課程結束後七個月都還在進行。這是為什麼呢？

As you mention, the last semester registration was in spring in 2017. So, reasonably speaking, there was not any homework after that. However, you have messages with your co-worker after 7 months. Why do you do that?

Well, I might not have finished that program but it doesn’t mean I didn’t want to improve my language ability. Even when I failed the program, I still wanted to improve my Chinese ability, so I continued to study on my own.
即使我沒有拿到那個學位，這不代表我就不想要精進我的語言能力，所以在那之後，我還是一直嘗試著想要精進我的中文能力，所以我就一直靠著自學的方式來進修。
你的意思是，儘管你沒有完成那個碩士課程，你還是想要不斷的學中文，讓你的中文更加流利，是嗎？
Do you mean that even though you didn’t complete that master degree, you still want to sharpen your Chinese language skill. So, you try your best to learn Chinese, right?
Yes, that’s why I asked my colleague for help
是的，所以我找我的同事幫忙。
那你的這位同事，她所扮演的角色就像你的家教囉？
So, your co-worker is kind of your tutor?
She has been not only a tutor but also a true friend.
她不只是家教，而且還是我一個非常要好的朋友。
你有付錢給她嗎
Do you pay for her?
No, I offered to pay her but she declined.
沒有，我想要付錢給她，但她拒絕了。
如果你沒有付錢給她，她為什麼要在半夜應該就寢的時候還不辭辛勞的發簡訊回答你的問題呢？這是不是已經超過了一個同事應該做的事情？
If you didn’t pay for her, why does she still message you in the midnight? Is this totally beyond co-worker’s relationship?
That’s why I said she was a very supportive friend. She was using her own time to help me learn Chinese.
這就是為什麼我說她是非常有義氣的朋友，然後她甚至不辭辛勞犧牲自己私人時間來幫我學習中文。
你現在還有在那家補習班教英文嗎？
Do you still teach English in that cram school?
Yes, I am still working there.
是的，我還在那邊工作。
那這位同事也還在那裏服務嗎？
Is your colleague still in there?
She is also still working there but we do not team up any more.
她還有在那邊工作，但我們沒有常常搭檔了。
請問檢察官，有沒有進一步要傳喚的證人或是調查事證？
The prosecutor, do you have any evidence or witness and wanted to investigate or subpoena?
希望能夠傳訊被告的同事，也就是任職美而美補習班的黃蓉兒以證人身分到庭，說明他與被告之間的關係，以及那些簡訊的撰寫背景及目的。
I wanted to subpoena the co-worker of the defendant, Rong-Er Huang, as a witness. I hope she will be on court to explain the messages and the relationship with the defendant.
請問告訴人有沒有任何希望本庭代為調查的事證？
The accuser, do you have any evidence and want the court to investigate for you?
我聽說美而美補習班針對他們兩個人的關係，有採取一些行動。其中更有試圖說服該女黃蓉兒離職一事，不知道能不能向那個補習班求證這件事情。
I heard about that Mei Er Mei Cram School tried to intervene this event, and they even tried to fire Rong-Er Huang. So, I hope the court ask Mei Er Mei Cram School to verify the situation.
那請問被告，有沒有任何希望法庭為你調查的事證？現在的情況是，你的碩士學位早就已經在中華民國106年5月就已結束，實在沒有理由以做作業為藉口來解釋你跟黃蓉兒的簡訊互動，尤其是你們的簡訊互動大多在晚上九點鐘以後進行，實在起人疑竇，你有沒有任何證據可以幫助你的案情呢？

The defendant, do you have any evidence and want the court to investigate for you? Your problem is that your master degree should be over in May in 2017, and you really didn’t have any reasons for messaging with your co-worker, Rong-Er Huang. And most importantly, you usually message each other after 9 P.M. every night, it’s really hard for us not to suspect you. So, do you have anything to help with your case?

I cannot think of any evidence that the court can investigate on my behalf. As I said, the reason for the communication between my colleague and myself was very simple. I only wanted to improve my language ability and continue to learn Chinese.
我沒有進一步的證據可以證明這件事，但是就像我所說的，我跟我同事之間的簡訊真的單純只是為了想要精進我的中文能力而已。
那本庭訂中華民國107年6月24日下午4點30分進行證人詰問程序，請告訴人、被告都要到庭，如果有必要，雙方都可以請辯護人，明白嗎？
The next court is set on 6/24 in 2018. The time is 4:30 P.M. We will ask questions for the witness. If the both party have necessary assistance, you can have a lawyer.
我明白。
I understand.
I understand, too.
我也了解了。

Today we are here for the preparatory procedure of an adultery case. There were intimate messages between the two of them and the defendant had made up reasons for working long nights. He also tele-conferenced with Rong-Er Huang at midnight. The accuser believed they have a relationship beyond co-workers. The defendant, your wife has accused you of adultery. What’s your plea?
Not guilty, of course.
當然無罪

先請問告訴人，妳跟妳先生結婚多久了？有小孩嗎？

我跟我先生已經結婚四年了，我們沒有小孩。

那妳跟妳先生是在台灣結婚的嗎？還是在國外結婚的

我跟我先生是在台灣認識的，四年前他剛來台灣，主要想要教葡萄牙文。
We met in Taiwan four years ago. He came to Taiwan because he wants to teach Portuguese.
那過去幾年，他在台灣的工作都是教葡萄牙文嗎？
So in the past few years, his job was to teach Portuguese?
我們剛開始認識的時候，他是一位葡萄牙文老師，在我們結婚之後，他還有繼續教葡萄牙文，可是葡萄牙文在台灣並不是一個有很多人學的語言，所以他的授課時數一直很不穩定，有時候甚至一兩個月的課程都會是空窗期，後來因為希望能夠讓收入比較穩定，他想要開始教英文，可是因為他的母語並不是英文，所以他決定要去進修。

When we first met, he was a Portuguese teacher. After we got married, he still teaches Portuguese. However, Portuguese is not popular in Taiwan. His teaching hours can be very low sometimes. Like..the period between jobs is like one to two month. In order to have a stable income, he decided to switch to teaching English. However, his mother tongue is not English, so he decided to seek an advanced degree.
你剛剛講到他決定要進修，是在台灣念一個學位嗎？
You just mentioned that he wanted to seek an advanced degree, does it mean that he want to have a degree in Taiwan?
不是，因為他希望能夠在台灣教英文，所以必須取得的學位是關於英語教學的。他在網路上找到了一個美國加州所提供的遠距教學課程，讓他可以不用人去美國，都可以用函授的方式，完成課程的要求，這樣子在完成所有的學分之後，就可以取得碩士學位。他的計畫是，透過這樣子的一個美國學位，能夠在台灣找到英文教師的工作。

No, because he wants to teach English in Taiwan, so he had to get a degree on English-teaching. He found a distance learning program online from California so he can have distance learning instead of taking course in the USA. After he finishes all his courses, he can get a master degree. Therefore, he is able to get a job in Taiwan.
那他跟這次所謂的外遇對象，是什麼樣的關係呢？
What is his relationship with the person he has an affair with?
他們是補習班的同事。那個補習班有安排所謂的中師跟外師搭檔教學。那個女的就是他班上的中師。
They were colleagues at the same working place. The cram school will partner an English teacher with a Chinese teacher. They were partners.
你怎麼會知道他們有外遇呢？
How did you assume that they have adultery?
一開始我只是注意到我先生常常會留在學校加班，我問過他好幾次，只不過是個美語補習班，有什麼好加班的？他告訴我說，因為要和中師搭檔教學，有很多需要溝通的地方。一開始我真的沒有懷疑他，可是我後來發現，他常常會在回家之後，接到一些電話，而接到電話的時候，都不會在我面前講，還會特地到書房去講。這讓我開始有所懷疑。所以我就查看了他的手機。

At first, I noticed my husband will often stay at the cram school for long hours. I asked him several times. It was merely an English cram school, why did he need to work for such long hours. However, when I found out that he got a lot of calls after he got back home and he would hide to the study room to answer them. So I decided to check his cellphone.
在手機中你看到什麼不尋常的嗎？
Did you find anything suspicious on his phone?
他的通訊紀錄中常常看到同一個電話號碼，所以我很好奇的又去查他的簡訊，查了之後才發現他跟一個女的幾乎每天都通簡訊。
In his phone book, there was a number he often called and answered. So I was curious and I checked his messages and I found out he had been texting this girl for a long time.
就算是發簡訊，也還好吧？難道內容很不恰當嗎？

如果只是普通的簡訊也就罷了，可是他是一個已婚的人。怎麼會讓對方發一些很親密的字句呢。之前我有提供一些他們的簡訊內容給法院，應該都在卷夾裡面了。
He is a married man. Why did the woman text him intimate messages? I have provided files to the court previously. The evidence should be in the files.
提示偵卷(一)第13頁。這邊裡面有幾通簡訊內容，請被告看一下。請問這是你手機上的簡訊內容嗎？
Check and confirm the evidence used in the case. Investigatory record p.13, are these the messages you sent, defendant?
Yes, these were the messages on my cell phone.
是的，這是我手機上的簡訊內容。
那我現在要針對這幾個內容跟你問一下，第一封是在中華民國106年12月21日21點50分，由手機0958-932123發送到你手機上的簡訊，內容是「I really miss you, my love」，請問這是什麼意思？

Now I am going to ask you some questions based on these messages. The first message was sent on December 12th ,2018 at 9:50 pm. It was sent by the number 0958-932123. The content is「I really miss you, my love」. What does that mean?

Well, it’s from a colleague of mine. I remember, at that time, I took two days off from work. She was a bit concerned or worried. That’s why she sent me that message. My colleague was educated in the US and she is very open-minded. That’s the way she talked and expressed herself. As to “my love,” that is just a way we call the people we care.
那封簡訊是我同事傳來的，我記得那時候請了兩天假，她有點擔心我，所以才傳的。我同事在美國受教育所以她思想比較開放，至於我的愛呢，那只是我們對在乎的人的稱呼。
你是說，這個發信人因為之前在國外待過所以思想比較西化，對情感的表達也比較開放一點，所以「我的愛」並沒有什麼特別的意思，是嗎？
You mean that because your colleague is educated in the US before so she is westernized and has an open mind so my love does not mean anything special?
No, that is a very common expression between good friends or friends who care a lot for each other.
對阿，那只是對在乎的人一個常用的稱呼而已。
那她前面那句呢？
How about the “I miss you” part?
As I said, she was worried about me. We are partners at work. When I was away for two days, she naturally missed me.
就像我剛剛說的，那時候我請了兩天的假，她自然就打出了那些字阿。
你的意思是，對方只是因為你兩天沒有上班，才發這樣的簡訊表達說因為沒有你上課的輔助，所以她很想你？就只是這樣子嗎？
Do you mean the reason she sent the message is because at then you took two days off and without your assistance she missed you a lot.
Yes, that was the context. The message was no big deal.
是阿，內容大致如此，那簡訊沒什麼大不了的。
那第二封簡訊，是在中華民國106年12月29日23點55分，也是由同一個人的手機發送給你，訊息內容是「I want you by my side, when can we be truly together?」，請問這句話是什麼意思，為什麼會有這樣的內容呢？
The second message was sent on December 29th , 2018 at 11:55pm, and it was sent by the same number, the content was “ I want you by my side, when can we be truly together? ” what does this mean?
She wrote me that message to tell me how to express a Chinese sentence in my assignment.
她傳這封訊息來教我怎麼正確表達在我作業上的中文句子。
你是說對方會發這個簡訊給你，是為了幫助你做作業嗎？這是什麼意思？
She sent the message because she wanted to help you in the assignment? What does that mean?

As my wife has informed the court, I was attending a Master’s program. In that program, I was required to complete 30 credits before I could receive my degree. Naturally, I needed to complete some assignments and exercises.
就像我太太告知法院的，要完成碩士學位，我必須修滿三十學分，所以我自然有一些功課要做。
先請你解釋一下，你的碩士學位到底在念什麼？
Could you please explain what the program of your master degree is?
My program was TESOL. In that program, some of the courses were related to English teaching and others were related to culture and language competence.
我的碩士學位是有關英語教學的，除了教學以外還有些課程和文化跟語言能力有關。
所以你拿的是英語教學碩士，可是裡面有一些文化溝通的課程，是嗎？
So your master degree was about TESOL and there are some cultural communication programs?
Yes, I remember at least three courses were related to culture and communication.
是的，我記得至少有三堂有關文化溝溝通的課程
那這種所謂的文化溝通課程，都給什麼樣的作業呢？
What is your homework in those courses?

The assignments for the culture and communication courses can be different for every student. Take myself for example. I am in Taiwan and try to seek a teaching position as an English teacher. 對啊，那根本就沒有代表什麼，它只不過就是互相表達關心的詞而已。
那她前面那句呢？

正如我前面所說的，我沒去上班的兩天，她很想我。

是啊，我記得至少有3堂是文化與溝通的課程。

這門課文化與溝通的課程每個學生的作業都不太一樣，像我是待台灣，我就必須要證明我可以精準的駕馭中文，還有我的中文能力這樣子。因此我中文很多都是中英翻譯。

You mean because you have to teach Taiwanese English so you have to prove your Chinese ability so there are a lot of Chinese and English assignments for you, is it?

是啊，我的確有必要去精進我的口說和寫作能力。

中文字對我來說就是有幾個字很難辨認，所以我就寄了這封簡訊給她，請她翻譯過來。

那封簡訊就只是我作業的解答而已。

是的，這些簡訊全部都是作業要用的。

我覺得我太太真的是想太多了，我知道她覺得我沒有能力撫養家庭。因為他都不支持我這個碩士學位，所以我只好問我同事，如果她肯支持我一點，我就不用問我同事了，我覺得她必須為這整個誤會負責。

我們一開始還不錯，但可能是教葡萄牙語的關係，可能就…。自從開始教葡萄牙語，工作的關係就一直起爭執，她覺得我都一直沒有盡我的力去工作，但其實我經常遇到挫折，我都沒辦法跟她說

我是在2015開始，預計2017年結束，但因為我一直有在兼職，所以我一直無法完成我的碩士課程。就像我說的，我太太一點都不支持我，我必須獨力完成這個學位，我覺得很累很挫折挫敗。
你是說這個課程原來是兩年期的，可是你最後沒有完成。為什麼呢？

我沒有辦法完成所有課程作業，還有一些課程必修。

如果誠如你所述，你最後一個學期的結束日期是中華民國106年5月，那麼合理推斷在那個學期之後，你就不會有任何的作業了。但是你與同事之間的簡訊聯絡卻一直到課程結束後七個月都還在進行。這是為什麼呢？

我沒能完成我的學位，並不代表我不想繼續精進我的中文能力，為了繼續精進中文能力，所以我一直有在試圖傳簡訊增進中文。

那就是我問我同事的目的，希望她幫我。

她不只是我的家教，還是我的朋友。

沒有，我想要付，但她婉拒。
如果你沒有付錢給她，她為什麼要在半夜應該就寢的時候還不辭辛勞的發簡訊回答你的問題呢？這是不是已經超過了一個同事應該做的事情？

這就是我說她為什麼總是這麼支持我，用盡所有的時間來教我中文。

她也繼續在在那邊教書，但我們不再是一個團隊了。

請問告訴人有沒有任何希望本庭代為調查的事證？

我聽說美而美補習班針對他們兩個人的關係，有採取一些行動。其中更有試圖說服該女黃蓉兒離職一事，不知道能不能向那個補習班求證這件事情。

那請問被告，有沒有任何希望法庭為你調查的事證？現在的情況是，你的碩士學位早就已經在中華民國106年5月就已結束，實在沒有理由以做作業為藉口來解釋你跟黃蓉兒的簡訊互動，尤其是你們的簡訊互動大多在晚上九點鐘以後進行，實在起人疑竇，你有沒有任何證據可以幫助你的案情呢？

No, that is a very common expression between good friends or friends who care a lot for each other.

According to the statement you made in the police station, you went home at about 6:30 p.m. After you parked your motorcycle, you went upstairs. After you had a dinner, you look out of the window and saw someone at the downstairs was moving your motorcycle, so you went downstairs to check the situation. When you walked downstairs you saw… 大明張, who is the accuser of this case, was moving your motorcycle. Therefore, you asked the accuser why he moved your motorcycle, and the accuser said that your motorcycle had blocked his car. You should not park the motorcycle here, so he moved the motorcycle. Because you didn’t agree the other party’s answer, so you have an argument with the accuser. Is it right?

Do you mean that the quarrel on the motorcycle parking space between both parties was not happened for the first time?

I have lived in that community for at least eight months. The plaintiff has more than once tried to move my motorbike without any reason. He just didn’t like the idea that I parked my motorcycle there, but he has no place in that matter. Everyone in the neighborhood has the right to park his/her vehicle if there is available space.
我住在這個社區已經至少有八個月了，告訴人在沒有原因的情況下…移動我的摩托車已經超過一次了。他只是不喜歡我把摩托車停在那裡，但是他沒有任何理由去做這件事。 在社區，每個人都有權利把車子停在沒有人停的地方。
以前曾經到警察局為類似的口角備過案嗎？
Have you ever been to police station to report the incident like such case?

To answer your question, no, I have never filed the cases with the police, but other neighbors also have similar experiences.
我們之前發生口角的時候，我都會避免發生肢體衝突，有時候我並不介意我的摩托車被移，有時候我會假裝沒有這件事發生。對於告訴人回答，我是從來沒有去和警察報警，其他鄰居也有類似的經驗。
在你們的社區中，摩托車的停放有一定的位子嗎？
In your community, does the parking of the motorcycle have the certain space?
No, basically we can park in any empty spot. It’s on a first-come-first-serve basis.
沒有，任何人都可以停在沒有人停的空位上，是先到先有的概念。
所以針對摩托車停放一事，只要有空的位子，就可以停放，是嗎？
So for the parking of the motorcycle, can everyone park if the space is available?
Yes. If there is an empty spot, anyone can park his/her motorbike there.
是的，只要有空位，任何人都可以去停車。
那你們的停放位置有畫停車格嗎？
Then, does the parking space have some parking slot?
Yes, the city government has marked more than 10 designated parking spaces for motorcycles.
沒錯，我們的市政府有畫超過十個位置讓摩托車停放
提示偵券(一)第24頁之照片，照片中顯示，被告社區摩托車停放有畫停車格。請被告確認。

是的，在這片裡面有我們社區的摩托車停車格。

He didn’t answer. I tried to step forward and stop him from moving my motorbike.
當我從樓上看到有人移動我的摩托車，我就下樓來確認。就像我剛剛說的，已經不只一次有人移動我的摩托車了，我真的不喜歡這樣的事發生。當我下樓時，我看見告訴人的手放在我的摩托車把手上面，我就問他在做什麼，他沒有回我，於是我就向前想要制止他。
所以說，是他要移動你的摩托車，而你上前制止，才會發生推擠情事，是嗎？

你記得是誰先動手的嗎？
Do you remember who did this thing first?
I believe I tried to push his hands away.
我記得我是要把他的手推開。

Please refer to page 8 in Investigatory Record about the record from the police. In line 10 on page 9 the accuser used his hand to hold the handlebars. 沒錯，這是在事件發生之後我到警局做的筆錄。
在你撥開對方的手時，他有什麼反應嗎？

Yes.
沒錯。
接下來發生什麼事呢？
What happened next?
Because his body language told me he wouldn’t let go of my motorcycle, I ended up pushing his shoulder, hoping that he would loosen up the grab of the handlebars.
從他的肢體語言來看，他並不想要放手，所以我推了他的肩膀，希望他可以將手放開。
因為這樣子，你推了他的肩膀，是嗎？

是的，我推了他的肩膀。
你覺得當時你有很用力嗎？
Do you think at that time you pushed him with much force?

沒有，我只是輕輕的推一下，就像是我們平常會推推別人的情況。

那天晚上我女友在家，他知道我下樓，他也知道我和告訴人之間發生了什麼事。
你的意思是說，你女朋友有看到那天的事件嗎？

She came down in the middle of the confrontation. She intended to film what’s going on with her cell phone, just in case we needed the clip to prove what happened.
她有下樓來並且介入我們的肢體衝突，她…拿起手機拍下影片，以免我們需要影片來知道發生了甚麼事。

她在我第一次要嘗試去抓我的摩托車把手時到達了現場。
後來她有拍成功嗎？

那我的問題先問到這裡。

No.

The defendant at 7:50 pm, on June 18th, 2020, you were at the door of your house and you had a quarrel with your neighbor because of your motorcycle was moved. After that, the situation evolved into physical confrontation. As for the checking and confirmation of the evidence used in this case, we can look at the investigatory record on page 8, there are statements made at the police station. At the police station, and in the statement, you said that around 6:30 pm, you arrived at your house and after you parked your motorcycle, you went upstairs. After you had dinner, and you looked down from the window, you saw that there was a person who was about to move your motorcycle, so you went downstairs and checked the situation. When you went downstairs you encountered the accuser, 張大明, he was removing your motorcycle. So you asked the accuser why do you have to remove my motorbike, and the accuser said that because the motorbike blocked his car and he shouldn’t park his motorbike there, so the accuser removed the motorbike. The defendant, since you disagree with the accuser, so you had a quarrel.
Yes, that’s what happened basically. I just want to emphasize that it was not the first time we argued about the parking issue of my motorbike.
基本上就是事發的原因。我想強調的是，這不是我們第一次因為移動車子的事而發生口角了。

I have lived in that community for at least eight months. The plaintiff has more than once tried to move my motorbike without any reason. He just didn’t like the idea that I parked my motorcycle there, but he has no place in that matter. Everyone in the neighborhood has the right to park his/her vehicle if there is available space.
我已經住在這個社區至少八個月了，那告訴人也是不止一次挪動我的摩托車，而且每次都是無緣無故的。他就只是不喜歡我把摩托車停在那裡，他根本沒有任何立場可以這樣做。所有住在這個社區的人都有權利把車停在可停的地方。
以前曾經到警察局為類似的口角備過案嗎？

The defendant, the incident happened at 7:50 pm on June 18th, 2020 in front of your door. You had a quarrel with your neighbor about moving your motorcycle. At first it was only a little argument, but it became physical confrontation. The first evidence is as stated in page 8 investigatory file. It is the statements made at the police station. As stated in the statements made at the police station, you said that you went home on that day at 6:30 pm. You parked your car and then went home. After that you were having dinner, then you looked downstairs and saw someone moving your motorcycle, so you went downstairs to take a look at what was happening. When you went downstairs, you found out the one who was moving your motorcycle was your neighbor, Da-Ming Chang, which is the accuser. He was moving your motorcycle. You asked the accuser why did he move your motorcycle. The accuser answered that because your motorcycle was blocking his car, and you shouldn’t park your motorcycle at that place, so he moved your motorcycle. Because you disagreed with his statement, so you had quarrels with him, right?
Yes, that’s what happened basically. I just want to emphasize that it was not the first time we argued about the parking issue of my motorbike.
是的，基本上那就是事發經過。我想要強調這不是第一次我們因為我的摩托車停放位置吵架。
你的意思是說，雙方在摩托車停放位置這件事情上，已經不是第一次發生爭執嗎？
Do you mean that both parties have already had arguments about where the motorcycle is parked before?

I have lived in that community for at least eight months. The plaintiff has more than once tried to move my motorbike without any reason. He just didn’t like the idea that I parked my motorcycle there, but he has no place in that matter. Everyone in the neighborhood has the right to park his/her vehicle if there is available space.
我在這個社區已經住了八個月了，告訴人他已經多次嘗試移動我的摩托車。他只是不滿和看不慣我把車子停在那裏。這個社區的所有住戶都有權利可以在這個停車場停放自己的汽車或機車，只要有空位。
以前曾經到警察局為類似的口角備過案嗎？
Have you ever been to the police station to report cases about these kinds of arguments?

When we had quarrels before, I always tried to avoid confrontation. Sometimes, I didn’t mind his removal of my motorcycle. Other times, I would just pretend it didn’t happen. To answer your question, no, I have never filed the cases with the police, but other neighbors also have similar experiences.
之前發生口角的時候我都會盡量避免肢體衝突。有時候我甚至不會在乎他移動我的摩托車，有時候我會假裝沒有看到。回答剛才的問題，我沒有去警局備過案，但其他鄰居有相似的經驗。
在你們的社區中，摩托車的停放有一定的位子嗎？
In your community, do the motorcycles have their own specific parking slot?
No, basically we can park in any empty spot. It’s on a first-come-first-serve basis.
沒有，我們基本上是只要有空位就可以停。基本上是採先到先有的制度。
所以針對摩托車停放一事，只要有空的位子，就可以停放，是嗎？

Yes. If there is an empty spot, anyone can park his/her motorbike there.
是的，只要有空位任何人都可以停放他的機車。
那你們的停放位置有畫停車格嗎？
Is there a parking slot at where you park your motorcycle?
Yes, the city government has marked more than 10 designated parking spaces for motorcycles.
是的，市政府已經有劃分十個特定的機車空位給我們停放。

Then how did the arguments you had that day evolve into physical confrontation?

When I saw someone was moving my motorcycle from upstairs, I rushed down to check what happened. As I said, it was not the first time that someone moved my motorcycle. 是的，當我試著想要用雙手我摩托車的把手，他卻沒有放手。

Then do you remember who started the fight first?

我記得是我先想要把他的手推開。

According to the investigatory file page number 8, there are the statements made at the police station. Yes.

接下來發生什麼事呢？

因為他的肢體語言告訴我他不會放開我的把手，所以我就推了一下他的肩膀，想要讓他放手。
因為這樣子，你推了他的肩膀，是嗎？

是的，我推了他的肩膀。

沒有，在我記憶中我只是輕輕推了他的肩膀一下。就像有時候我們希望對方停止動作的時候的輕推。

提示偵券(一)第8頁之警局訊問記錄。在第9頁的第10行，這裡提到，對方用手抓住你的摩托車把手緊緊不放，硬是要強行挪動你的摩托車，於是你上前撥開他的手。所以你剛剛講的你先動手，是指這個動作嗎？

他並沒有移開，相反的他更用力的掐握著我的摩托車

Yes.

我並沒有推他推的很大力，我大概就是以平常要別人不做甚麼事情的那種力道

My girlfriend was home that evening. She knew I was going downstairs and she is also aware of the history between me and that neighbor.
那個時候我的女友正在家中，她知道我要下樓去查看，也知道我和那位鄰居發生的事

她下來時，我正好要將伸手握取機車把手

Did she film the scene successfully?
No, when she took out her cell phone, the plaintiff warned her not to do that. He had no right to tell her that.

那我的問題先問到這裡。
There’s no further question.

The accused. Today is the preliminarily preparatory procedure. Is there any evidence that you would like to ask the court to investigate for you for the next court?

So you want us to check the two CCTV in your community? So could you tell the court more precisely about which area should we check?

我是大約在7:40的時候下樓的，所以我希望法院可以調閱7:30分到8:10這段時間的影像
檢察官對於被告所要求查閱監視錄影帶一事，有何意見？
Prosecutor, do you have anything to add about the defendant want to check the CCTV?
沒有意見。

被告Steven Knox於中華民國109年6月18日晚間7點50分在其自家門口 （地址為：新北市板橋區長江路 23號6樓），因其摩托車被挪動而與鄰居（即告訴人）發生口角，進而產生肢體衝突。經告訴人至醫院驗傷，醫師診斷為手臂、身體多處挫傷、瘀青，後被提告。檢察官起訴被告違反刑法375條之傷害罪，被告做何答辯？

The incident happened at 7:50 pm on June 18, 2020 and the incident took place in front of the accused’s house, the address is 6 Floor, No.23 Changjiang Road, Banqiao District, New Taipei City. On that day, the motorcycle of the accused was moved, so the accused have some quarrel with his neighborhood, the accuser, and then have physical confrontation. 被告於於中華民國109年6月18日晚間7點50分在自家門口，與鄰居（即告訴人）因挪動摩托車一事發生口角、爭執，進而衍生成肢體衝突。提示證據一偵券(一)第8頁之警局筆錄。被告你在警局筆錄當中陳述，當天你在晚上六點半回到自家門口，將摩托車停好之後，便上樓。之後用完晚餐時，你往樓下看，發現有人正要挪動你的摩托車，於是立刻下樓查看。當你到樓下的時候，發現是鄰居張大明，也就是告訴人，正在牽你的摩托車。於是你問他，為什麼要挪動你的摩托車，對方回答，因為你的摩托車擋到他的車子，而且你不應該停在那個位置，所以他才要移開你的車。因為不同意對方的回答，你們才會發生口角，是嗎？

The defendant, at the time of 7:50 pm, June 18, 2020, you had a quarrel and physical confrontation with your neighborhood in front of your house because of the move of your motorcycle. In the investigatory record 1 page 8, on that page there is the statement made at the police station. As the statement stated, you said that you went home at 6:30. After you parked your motorcycle, you went upstairs. After you finished, you looked down from the window and see someone wanted to move your motorcycle. After you went down and checked, you found that your neighborhood, Da Ming Chang, was moving your motorcycle. You asked the accuser why he moved your motorcycle and he replied that your motorcycle was obstacle, and you shouldn’t park at that place. Because you can not accept his statement, so you have argument, right?
Yes, that’s what happened basically. I just want to emphasize that it was not the first time we argued about the parking issue of my motorbike.
我只是想強調這已經不是第一次為了停車的事情吵架。
你的意思是說，雙方在摩托車停放位置這件事情上，已經不是第一次發生爭執嗎？
So you mean that it was not the first time that you have argument with each other because of the parking place of the motorcycle.

I have lived in that community for at least eight months. The plaintiff has more than once tried to move my motorbike without any reason. He just didn’t like the idea that I parked my motorcycle there, but he has no place in that matter. Everyone in the neighborhood has the right to park his/her vehicle if there is available space.
我住在那個社區八個月了，告訴人不只一次的想要移動我的機車，而且都沒有原因。他不喜歡我把我把我的車子停在那哩，但已經沒有其他可以停的地方了。如果有空位的話，社區的每個人都有權利把他們的交通工具停在那個地方，如果有空位的話。
以前曾經到警察局為類似的口角備過案嗎？
Have you ever reported to the police about this condition.

When we had quarrels before, I always tried to avoid confrontation. Sometimes, I didn’t mind his removal of my motorcycle. Other times, I would just pretend it didn’t happen. To answer your question, no, I have never filed the cases with the police, but other neighbors also have similar experiences.
之前發生口角，我都會避免肢體衝突，有時候我並不在意他移動我的車，我甚至會假裝沒發生過這件事。回到你的問題，我並沒有去警察局備案過，但其他鄰居也有發生過類似的經驗。
在你們的社區中，摩托車的停放有一定的位子嗎？

No, basically we can park in any empty spot. It’s on a first-come-first-serve basis.
沒有固定的位子，只要有空位就可以停，通常是只要有車位，你就可以先停進去。
所以針對摩托車停放一事，只要有空的位子，就可以停放，是嗎？
So you mean that about the issue parking of motorcycle, everyone can park their motorcycle if there are empty spaces.
Yes. If there is an empty spot, anyone can park his/her motorbike there.
對，只要有空位，每個人都可以停在那裏。
那你們的停放位置有畫停車格嗎？
In your community, are there any parking slots with lines?
Yes, the city government has marked more than 10 designated parking spaces for motorcycles.
沒錯，市政府有在我們的社區裡劃很多停車格。
提示偵券(一)第24頁之照片，照片中顯示，被告社區摩托車停放有畫停車格。請被告確認。
According to the investigatory record 1 page 24, and there is a photo, the photo shows that in the community, there actually parking slots. The defendant, please make sure of it.
Yes, in the picture are the parking slots for motorcycles in our neighborhood.
是的，照片裡的停車格是讓摩托車停的。
那，你們那一天發生口角之後，為何會演變成肢體衝突？
What’s your reason that your argument evolved into physical confrontation on that day?

When I saw someone was moving my motorcycle from upstairs, I rushed down to check what happened. As I said, it was not the first time that someone moved my motorcycle. I just didn’t feel like tolerating the matter anymore that night. When I went downstairs, I saw the plaintiff placed his hands on the handlebars of my motorbike. I asked him what he was doing. 當我在樓上看到有人想移動我的摩托車時，我立刻衝了下去。就像我說的，這已經不是第一次，我已經沒辦法再容忍這樣的事情發生了。當我下樓的時候，我看到告訴人正在抓著我摩托車的把手，我問他在做什麼，但他沒有回答，所以我向前想要把我的摩托車拿回來。
所以說，是他要移動你的摩托車，而你上前制止，才會發生推擠情事，是嗎？
You mean that the accuser was moving your motorcycle, and you stepped forward to stop him so you have some physical confrontation like pushing, right?
Yes, after I put out my hands and tried to hold the handlebars of my motorcycle, he didn’t let go of them.
是的，當我上前試著抓住我的把手，但他卻緊握著不放
你記得是誰先動手的嗎？
Do you remember who is the first one to hit the other party?
I believe I tried to push his hands away.
我記得是我想把他的手挪開我的把手。
提示偵券(一)第8頁之警局訊問記錄。在第9頁的第10行，這裡提到，對方用手抓住你的摩托車把手緊緊不放，硬是要強行挪動你的摩托車，於是你上前撥開他的手。所以你剛剛講的你先動手，是指這個動作嗎？

I’m going to show you the questioning statement in police station on the investigatory record 1 page 8. On the page 9 line10, you said the accuser grabbed your handlebar tightly. And he insist to move your motorcycle, so stepped forward to remove his hands. As what you mentioned, you said that you have the physical action first, do the mean the action is removing his hands?
Yes, that’s the statements I made in the police station after the incident happened.
對，這是在事件發生後我到警局作的筆錄。
在你撥開對方的手時，他有什麼反應嗎？
After you remove the other party’s hands, what was his interaction
He didn’t move. Instead, he grabbed the handlebars even more tightly.
他不但沒有把他的手移開，還更用力把我的把手抓得更緊。
所以對方不但沒有放開，還更加鉗握住機車把手，對嗎？

Yes.
是的。
接下來發生什麼事呢？
Then what happened next?
Because his body language told me he wouldn’t let go of my motorcycle, I ended up pushing his shoulder, hoping that he would loosen up the grab of the handlebars.
從他的肢體動作，可以看到他是完全沒有想放開我的摩托車，所以我推了他肩膀，希望他可以放開我的把手。
因為這樣子，你推了他的肩膀，是嗎？
So you pushed his shoulder because of this?
Yes, I pushed his shoulder.
是的，我推了他的肩膀
你覺得當時你有很用力嗎？
Did you push his shoulder with much force?
No, what I did was just a gentle push, like how we generally push others to do or not do something.
沒有，我只是輕輕推一下，就像我們平常要制止別人時推他的力道一
提示偵券(一)第48 頁之市立聯合醫院診療證明。在醫生的診斷證明中指出，告訴人身體與手臂兩個地方，有多處挫傷跟瘀青。請問這是怎麼造成的，是你剛剛的推嗎？

我不知道為什麼他身上會有那些挫傷和瘀青，我並沒有做。
有任何人可以證實你剛剛所陳述，當天晚上的事發狀況嗎？
If there anyone can be your witness of the content you state and what happened that day?
My girlfriend was home that evening. She knew I was going downstairs and she is also aware of the history between me and that neighbor.
那天晚上，我女朋友在我家，他知道我下樓查看這件事，而且他也知道我和告訴人已經有很多次口角了。
你的意思是說，你女朋友有看到那天的事件嗎？
Do you mean that your girlfriend is a witness of the incident?
She came down in the middle of the confrontation. She intended to film what’s going on with her cell phone, just in case we needed the clip to prove what happened.
我女朋友那時候也下樓，並且在我們爭執時想錄下影片，就是為了可以讓影片當成證據。
準確來講，你女朋友是在什麼時間到達現場，然後嘗試想要用手機拍下衝突發生的經過呢？
Certainly, when did your girlfriend arrive at the scene, and try to film what happened?
She arrived at the scene just when I was going to grab the handlebars for the first time.
她在我第一次想要奪回把手時抵達現場。
後來她有拍成功嗎？

No, when she took out her cell phone, the plaintiff warned her not to do that. He had no right to tell her that.
沒有，正當我的女友要錄影時，告訴人警告她不准這麼做，但她並沒有權力制止我女朋友。
那我的問題先問到這裡。
Then my question ends here.

Today is the preliminary preparatory procedure, before the next court, do you need any evidence that need the court to investigate?
Yes, I would like to request the court to look into the clips taken by the two CCTV cameras that day.
是，我想要求法院調閱那天兩台監視器的畫面。
你的意思是說，你們社區巷口有監視器，希望我們能調閱錄影帶，是嗎？如果是的話，希望我們調閱哪一段區間呢，能否提供正確的時間？

Do you mean that there are CCTVs in the intersection of your community, so you want us to get those clips from it, right? If the answer is yes, can you provide certain time for us so we can request the clips more easily.

我是在7:40分下樓的，我希望能調閱7:30到8:10的監視器畫面。
